Ai-chan - Memories.name: Ai-chan - Memories
Ai-chan - Memories.slotM_effect: Melee Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) have a 10% chance of dealing 110% (200% at 5*) ATK of Ice DMG to targets hit and heal the character for 11 (20 at 5*) HP. CD: 2s.

Allan Poe.name: Allan Poe
Allan Poe.slotT_effect: Gain 9.0% (18.0% at 5*) Crit Rate. If there are 2 or more enemies present, 1.1% (2.0% at 5*) * n of the bonus Crit Rate will convert into 2.2% (4.0% at 5*) * n bonus Physical DMG (n=the number of enemies present, and nâ‰¤5).
Allan Poe.slotM_effect: After spending 3/33/63 SP in one action, Crit DMG of Basic Attacks (including Combo ATKs and Charged ATKs) increases by 20.0%/30.0%/40.0% (50.0%/60.0%/70.0% at 5*). This effect lasts until the next trigger.
Allan Poe.slotB_effect: Attack speed increases by 13.0% (25.0% at 5*). CD of Ultimate Evasion shortens by 9.0% (15.0% at 5*).
Allan Poe.setEffect2p: Gain 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier. Total DMG of Charged ATK and any follow-up hits unleashed within the following 1s increases by 40.0%. Seele equip bonus: Total DMG increases by an additional 40.0%. CD: 3s.
Allan Poe.setEffect3p: Once attacked, ignore the damage from the attack and greatly gain Ignore Interrupt for 3s. CD: 20.0s. During CD, the host restores 650 HP upon hitting enemies with Charged ATK (applies once during each CD). Seele equip bonus: Total DMG increases by 25.0%.Lang

Ana Schariac (Stigmata).name: Ana Schariac (Stigmata)
Ana Schariac (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Boosts Ice DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Host deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Total DMG to enemies within 5 meters. The bonus damage drops by 1.0% (2.0% at 5*) for every meter of distance beyond 5 meters (caps at 10 meters of distance).
Ana Schariac (Stigmata).slotM_effect: Boosts Ice DMG by 10.0% (25.0% at 5*) Host takes 7.0% (12.0% at 5*) less Total DMG and additional 4.0% (8.0% at 5*) less Total DMG from enemies within 5 meters.
Ana Schariac (Stigmata).slotB_effect: Boosts Attack Speed by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Host deals 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) bonus Ice DMG to enemies within 5 meters. The bonus damage drops by 1.5% (3.0% at 5*) for every meter of distance beyond 5 meters (caps at 10 meters of distance).
Ana Schariac (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Boosts Ice DMG by 25.0%. Combo and Charged ATKs summon Ice Pillars around enemies on hit to deal 400.0% ATK of Ice DMG to enemies nearby and boost host's Ignore Interrupt for 3s. CD: 10s.
Ana Schariac (Stigmata).setEffect3p: Combo and Charged ATKs deal 50.0% bonus Total DMG. Host deals 10.0% bonus Ice DMG to enemies within 5 meters.Lang

Anniversary Festival.name: Anniversary Festival
Anniversary Festival.slotT_effect: Ultimate Evasions generate an explosion around self that deals 90% (180% at 5*) ATK of Physical DMG to enemies. CD: 8s (4s at 5*).
Anniversary Festival.slotM_effect: When hit by an enemy with lower HP percentage than the host, take 15% (30% at 5*) less Physical DMG.
Anniversary Festival.slotB_effect: Attacks on an enemy with lower HP percentage than the host gain 20% (50% at 5*) Crit DMG.
Anniversary Festival.setEffect2p: Show time shares a common CD of 10s. Ultimate Evasion starts Kiana's Taijutsu, gaining 45% Physical DMG for 5s. Combo ATKs start Mei's Chado Ceremony, healing the host for 30 HP/s for 5s. Being hit by an enemy attack starts Bronya's Shooting Show, with said attack suffering 30% Total DMG Reduction and gaining 25% Attack Speed for 5s.
Anniversary Festival.setEffect3p: Gain 15% Max HP and 10% Crit Rate in battle.Lang

Anti-Entropy XMas.name: Anti-Entropy XMas
Anti-Entropy XMas.slotT_effect: For every stunned, paralyzed, or frozen enemy, the host gains 1% (4% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 4% times.
Anti-Entropy XMas.slotM_effect: When Combo or Charged ATKs hit the enemy, the host gains a buff that grants 4% (10% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier, 4% (10% at 4*) Total DMG Reduction, and 4% (10% at 4*) Attack Speed for 5s. CD: 15s.
Anti-Entropy XMas.slotB_effect: For every 20 Combo Hit Count, the host's next hit on the enemy deals another 100% (200% at 4*) ATK of Physical DMG.
Anti-Entropy XMas.setEffect2p: The host takes 10% less Lightning and Fire DMG and 15% less Ice DMG.
Anti-Entropy XMas.setEffect3p: Gain 15% Max HP. MECH-type battlesuit equip bonus: Gain another 10% Max HP.Lang

Aslaug.name: Aslaug
Aslaug.slotT_effect: Fire DMG increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Team deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Elemental DMG to enemies in Feathered state. Skill effects cannot stack.
Aslaug.slotM_effect: Fire DMG increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Every hit (CD: 1s) boosts host's Total DMG by 2.0% (5.0% at 5*) for 5s. 6 stacks max. Triggering it again resets the duration. Switching out removes all stacks. With host on standby, team deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Fire DMG. Skill effects cannot stack.
Aslaug.slotB_effect: Fire DMG increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). On hit, Ultimate inflicts Feathered state on enemies for 8s and makes them take 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Elemental DMG. Triggering it again resets the duration.
Aslaug.setEffect2p: Total DMG increases by 15.0%. Enemies in Feathered state take 30.0% bonus Elemental DMG instead. Team deals 12.0% bonus Total DMG. Skill effects cannot stack.
Aslaug.setEffect3p: Charged ATKs boost Total DMG by 20.0% on hit for 15s. Triggering it again resets the duration. With host on standby, team deals 30.0% bonus Fire DMG. Skill effects cannot stack.Lang

Attila.name: Attila
Attila.slotT_effect: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 10, gain 11% (15% at 4*) Move Speed.
Attila.slotM_effect: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 20, gain 26% (41% at 4*) DEF in battle.
Attila.slotB_effect: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 30, gain 19% (31% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Attila.setEffect2p: Gain 30% Crit DMG. MECH-type battlesuit equip bonus: Gain 10% Max SP in battle.

Avogadro.name: Avogadro
Avogadro.slotT_effect: The host gains 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) Total DMG. Team restores 15.0 (30.0 at 5*) HP per second for 10s after the host casts her weapon active. This effect has a 20-sec CD and cannot stack.
Avogadro.slotM_effect: The host's weapon active CD shortens by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*). Team gains 5.0% (10.0% at 5*) Total DMG for 12s after the host casts her weapon active. This effect has a 20-sec CD and cannot stack.
Avogadro.slotB_effect: The host gains 7.0% (15.0% at 5*) ATK Speed. Her weapon active deals 40.0% (65.0% at 5*) more Physical DMG for 5s after its activation. CD: 10s.
Avogadro.setEffect2p: The host gains 30.0 initial SP in battle, and her weapon active consumes 15.0% less SP.
Avogadro.setEffect3p: The host gains 15.0% Total DMG. Her weapon active inflicts a mark on the target (CD: 20s), which explodes after 10s and deals 400.0% ATK of large-AOE Physical DMG. The host additionally deals 15.0% more Total DMG against marked enemies.Lang

Azure Stars.name: Azure Stars
Azure Stars.slotB_effect: Gains 10% (15% at 5*) Ice DMG and 10% (20% at 5*) Elemental DMG Reduction.Azure Stars is a [[stigmata]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.==Sources==*[[Spring Shop (2020)]][[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Bastet.name: Bastet
Bastet.slotT_effect: Ice DMG increases by 7.0% (15.0% at 5*). Team deals 25.0% (30.0% at 5*) bonus Ice DMG to frozen enemies (cannot stack).
Bastet.slotM_effect: Total DMG increases by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*). Attacks inflict 12.0% (25.0% at 5*) bonus [[Rime Trauma]].
Bastet.slotB_effect: Total DMG increases by 12.0% (20.0% at 5*). Freezing enemies restores 5 (10 at 5*) SP for the team. CD: 8s.
Bastet.setEffect2p: Freezing enemies boosts team Total DMG by 50.0% (cannot stack) for 15s. Triggering it again resets the duration.
Bastet.setEffect3p: Total DMG increases by 30.0%. The Freeze effect inflicted by team members lasts 20.0% longer (cannot stack).Lang

Beach Angels.name: Beach Angels
Beach Angels.slotT_effect: Gain 10.0% (25.0% at 4*) Physical DMG but suffer 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) less Crit DMG.
Beach Angels.slotM_effect: Gain 10.0% (15.0% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier but suffers 10.0% (20.0% at 4*) less SP recovery.
Beach Angels.slotB_effect: Ultimate and Burst mode ATKs gain 15.0% (25.0% at 4*) Physical DMG, but Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) deal 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) less Physical DMG.
Beach Angels.setEffect2p: Combo ATKs gain 200% ATK of Physical DMG. CD: 4s.
Beach Angels.setEffect3p: Removed 1-pc debuffs from this stigmata set.Lang

Beach Party.name: Beach Party
Beach Party.slotT_effect: The team recovers 15 (24 at 5*) SP for every enemy defeated. Each trigger of the effect consumes 1 Cool Blessing. Gain 1 stack of Cool Blessing every 7s (max: 3 stacks). Battle starts with max stacks.
Beach Party.slotM_effect: The host gains 12% (18% at 5*) Total DMG. Enemies attacked by the host take 10% (15% at 5*) Total DMG for 4s. CD: 8.0s.
Beach Party.slotB_effect: When the host is on the field, attacks by any ally have a 15% (30% at 5*) chance to inflict 30% (60% at 5*) Move Speed for 4.0s. CD: 10s. This stigma effect cannot stack.
Beach Party.setEffect2p: When the host is attacking, there is 12% chance of summoning a HOMU King (summoned entity) who knocks down surrounding enemies and deals 450% ATK of Physical DMG (DMG calculations are based on the host's stats) against them. CD: 16s.
Beach Party.setEffect3p: All allies (including illusions) receive a Flame Wreath when HOMU King appears, dealing 893 Fire DMG every 0.5s to surrounding enemies. Flame wreath lasts 6s.Lang

Beethoven.name: Beethoven
Beethoven.slotT_effect: Gain 10% (20% at 5*) Max HP. Heavy Weapon user equip bonus: Gain 10% (20% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Beethoven.slotM_effect: After exit: Team mates gain 9% (15% at 5*) Melee Physical DMG buff (does not stack) and take 10% (20% at 5*) less Physical DMG from enemy hits.
Beethoven.slotB_effect: On the field: Gain 9 (15 at 5*) SP. CD: 18.0s (15.0s at 5*).
Beethoven.setEffect2p: After casting the Ultimate, next team member switching in gains a 40% Melee Physical DMG buff (does not stack) for 10s. CD: 20s.
Beethoven.setEffect3p: After casting the Ultimate, next team member switching in takes 30% less Total DMG (effect does not stack) for 10s and restores HP equal to 20% of the host's Max HP. CD: 20s.Lang

Benares: Awakening.name: Benares: Awakening
Benares: Awakening.slotT_effect: Boosts Total DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Boosts Lightning DMG by 25.0% (50.0% at 5*) in Herrscher Form.
Benares: Awakening.slotM_effect: Boosts Lightning DMG by 15.0% (25.0% at 5*). Upon entry or casting weapon active, host deals 8.0% (15.0% at 5*) bonus Total DMG for 9s. Can be refreshed.
Benares: Awakening.slotB_effect: Boosts Lightning DMG by 15.0% (25.0% at 5*). In Herrscher Form, attacks restore 3.0 (6.0 at 5*) SP on hit. CD: 6s.
Benares: Awakening.setEffect2p: Boosts Total DMG by 20.0%. In Herrscher Form, attacks inflict Thunderblitz on enemies for 7s (cannot be stacked but can be refreshed). Enemies in Thunderblitz take 50.0% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG for each hit. CD: 1s.
Benares: Awakening.setEffect3p: Boosts Lightning DMG by 20.0%. Host takes 15.0% less Total DMG. Enemies in Thunderblitz take 15.0% bonus Lightning DMG.Lang

Bianka: Theatre.name: Bianka: Theatre
Bianka: Theatre.slotT_effect: Physical DMG increases by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*). Landing Charged ATK 10 times enhances host and boost her Crit DMG by 25.0% (45.0% at 5*) for 15s. Triggering it again resets the duration.
Bianka: Theatre.slotM_effect: Total DMG increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill or Retaliation Skill enhances host and boosts Total DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) for 15s. Triggering it again resets the duration.
Bianka: Theatre.slotB_effect: Crit Rate increases by 5.0% (10.0% at 5*). Any team member triggering global Time Slow restores 0.5 (2.0 at 5*) SP for host. CD: 3s. Triggering global Time Slow on the field herself enhances host and further boosts her Crit Rate by 2.5% (5.0% at 5*) for 15s. Triggering it again resets the duration.
Bianka: Theatre.setEffect2p: Total DMG increases by 30.0%. [[Palatinus Equinox]] equip bonus: Triggering an enhancement from any stigma piece also triggers all other enhancements from other pieces in the set.
Bianka: Theatre.setEffect3p: Physical DMG increases by 30.0%. Triggering World's a Stage boosts Physical DMG dealt by host's next Ultimate by 80.0% and makes it restore 200.0 HP.Lang

Blood Embrace ELF.name: Blood Embrace ELF
Blood Embrace ELF.slotB_effect: Gain 4% (10% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier when attacking enemies with no shields.Lang

Bronya - Starry Gifts.name: Bronya - Starry Gifts
Bronya - Starry Gifts.slotB_effect: Heal the team for 20/100/200 (30/150/300 at 4*) HP after spending no less than 10/40/70 SP in one action.Lang

Bronya: Calories.name: Bronya: Calories
Bronya: Calories.slotB_effect: After Ultimate Evasion, heal 50 HP and gain 11.0% (20.0% at 4*) ATK Speed for 6s. Does not trigger again during this time.Lang

Bronya: Fun Time.name: Bronya: Fun Time
Bronya: Fun Time.slotB_effect: Total DMG increases by 4.0% (8.0% at 4*). [[Bronya]] equip bonus: Weapon Skills cost 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) less SP.Bronya: Fun Time is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.==Sources==*[[Absolute Game Time]][[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Bronya: Hacker.name: Bronya: Hacker
Bronya: Hacker.slotT_effect: Ranged attacks gain 10% (25% at 4*) Crit DMG.[[Bronya]] equip bonus: gain 10% (15% at 4*) Attack Speed.Lang

Bronya: Magic.name: Bronya: Magic
Bronya: Magic.slotT_effect: Charged ATKs gain 13% (20% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Bronya: Magic.slotM_effect: Gain 11% (15% at 4*) Ranged Physical DMG. [[Bronya]] equip bonus: Gain 6% (10% at 4*) Max HP in battle.
Bronya: Magic.setEffect2p: Gain 10% Total DMG Multiplier. [[Bronya]] equip bonus: Switch skills (including QTE) gain 10% Total DMG Multiplier.

Bronya: N-EX.name: Bronya: N-EX
Bronya: N-EX.slotT_effect: Total DMG increases by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*). Also, Combo ATKs summon a bird to dive-bomb the target on impact, dealing 100.0% (200.0% at 5*) Ice DMG to a small area. This is seen as Combo DMG with a CD of 8s.
Bronya: N-EX.slotM_effect: Total DMG increases by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*). With [Falconwings] active, Total DMG received is reduced by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*).
Bronya: N-EX.slotB_effect: When QTE deals DMG, grants 1 [Falconwings] stack. Each stack increases Ice DMG by 15.0% (25.0% at 5*) lasting for 20s, CD: 5s. 3 stacks max. Triggering it again resets the duration.
Bronya: N-EX.setEffect2p: Gain 1 [Falconwings] stack when performing an Ultimate or Combo ATK with this equipped. CD: 3s, each trigger condition CD calculated separately. Max stacked [Falconwings] increases Total DMG by 20.0%. Used with QTE, when QTE and [Falconwings] add together, if there are 3 [Falconwings] stacks, increases the Ice DMG by 10.0% for every stack granted by the B-piece of this set.
Bronya: N-EX.setEffect3p: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combos) deal an additional 25.0% Ice DMG upon impact. CD 0.3s per target. Max stacked [Falconwings] restore 30.0 HP per second.Lang

Bronya: Shadow.name: Bronya: Shadow
Bronya: Shadow.slotT_effect: Basic attacks (including combo and charged attacks) gain 20% (38% at 5*) Ranged Physical DMG.
Bronya: Shadow.slotM_effect: Generates a Dark Domain. Character gains 20% (35% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction but loses 40% Move Speed.
Bronya: Shadow.slotB_effect: Generates a Dark Aura after staying in a small AOE for 3s. In the Dark Aura, gain 20% (35% at 5*) Attack Speed. Effect is removed upon leaving the Aura (effects only apply for the character generating the Aura).
Bronya: Shadow.setEffect2p: After a charged attack using cannon or missile launchers, the next charged attack made after an interval of greater than 1s but less than 4s gains 15% Total DMG Multiplier. This DMG bonus stacks up to 3 times. Adding a stack resets the duration.
Bronya: Shadow.setEffect3p: Bronya equip bonus: Gain 60% Crit DMG.Lang

Bronya: Sloth.name: Bronya: Sloth
Bronya: Sloth.slotB_effect: Clears all remaining SP upon exit but recovers 1.2 (2.1 at 5*) SP/s when off the field.SP is quickly consumed when entering battle. Loses will to fight on and becomes lazy at below 20% SP.Lang

Caravaggio.name: Caravaggio
Caravaggio.slotT_effect: Gain 13% (25% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. When an entity summoned by the host is present, the host also gains 6% (15% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction.
Caravaggio.slotM_effect: Gain 13% (25% at 5*) Lightning DMG. When an entity summoned by the host is present, team also gains 4% (10% at 5*) All Elemental DMG (does not stack).
Caravaggio.slotB_effect: Gain 4% (10% at 5*) faster Move and ATK Speeds. When an entity summoned by the host is present, gain another 4% (10% at 5*) faster Move and ATK speeds.
Caravaggio.setEffect2p: For each hit dealt by an entity summoned by the host (CD: 2s), team gains 5% Elemental DMG (unique effect). Stacks up to 4 times. At 4 stacks, enter Natural State for 6s (effect no longer stacks at this state). Natural State: Gain another 20% Elemental DMG. All buffs are cleared when Natural State ends.
Caravaggio.setEffect3p: For every friendly summoned entity present, the host gains 15% Total DMG Reduction. CD: 10s. Stacks up to 3 times. Each hit taken removes 1 stack.Lang

Cecilia - Hawaii.name: Cecilia - Hawaii
Cecilia - Hawaii.slotT_effect: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combo ATKs) gain 5% (10% at 4*) Physical DMG. [[Kiana]] or [[Kallen]] equip bonus: Allies within a 2-meter (4-meter at 4*) radius heal 10 (20 at 4*) HP every 3s.Lang

Cecilia Schariac (Stigmata).name: Cecilia Schariac (Stigmata)
Cecilia Schariac (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Two stars, one black and one white, glitter overhead (collect the 2-piece set to illuminate them). Black Star shines: Basic attacks gain 30% (50% at 5*) Physical DMG. White Star shines: Combo attacks gain 30% (50% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Cecilia Schariac (Stigmata).slotM_effect: Two stars, one black and one white, glitter overhead (collect the 2-piece set to illuminate them). Black Star shines: Basic attacks recover 1 (4 at 5*) more SP; CD: 1.5s. White Star shines: Combo attacks heal self for 1% (2% at 5*) HP; CD: 1.5s.
Cecilia Schariac (Stigmata).slotB_effect: Two stars, one black and one white, glitter overhead (collect the 2-piece set to illuminate them). Black Star shines: Gain 25% (40% at 5*) Attack Speed. White Star shines: Gain 20% (40% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction against enemy attacks.
Cecilia Schariac (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Illuminates a black star and a white star. Black Star shines: Basic attacks have a 20% chance to gain 1,000% ATK of Physical DMG to non-Boss enemies; CD: 5s. White Star shines: combo attacks gain 30% Crit Rate.
Cecilia Schariac (Stigmata).setEffect3p: When deployed, every time the two stars switch, character gains 12% Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 3 times. Stacks are cleared once the character exits the battle.Lang

Cecilia: Pale Moon.name: Cecilia: Pale Moon
Cecilia: Pale Moon.slotT_effect: When hitting enemies with combo ATKs, host deals 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) more physical DMG for 3s. Max stacks: 2. Triggering this again resets the duration.Lang

Charlemagne.name: Charlemagne
Charlemagne.slotT_effect: Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gain 2% (4% at 4*) Physical DMG for every 5% of SP above a 70% threshold.
Charlemagne.slotM_effect: Gain 50% (75% at 4*) DEF at 70% or higher SP.
Charlemagne.slotB_effect: Gain 15% (25% at 4*) Move Speed at 70% or higher SP.
Charlemagne.setEffect2p: At 70% or higher SP, surrounding enemies lose 20% ATK and 20% DEF.
Charlemagne.setEffect3p: When attacking MECH-type enemies, gain 20% Physical DMG. [[Mei]] or [[Yae Sakura]] equip bonus: Gain 25% HP in battle.Lang

Children.name: Children
Children.slotT_effect: Host deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Physical DMG and after landing a Charged ATK, she deals 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) bonus Crit DMG for 4s (can be stacked).
Children.slotM_effect: Host deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Total DMG and against single enemies, she deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Crit DMG.
Children.slotB_effect: Host has 7.5% (15% at 5*) bonus Crit Rate. Every attack against the same target deals 2% (3% at 5*) more Physical DMG (8% [15% at 5*] max). Reset if no attacks in 10s or target changes.
Children.setEffect2p: When Charged ATKs hit, if there is no more than one enemy within 8m, host deals 45.0% bonus Total DMG for 6s.
Children.setEffect3p: Charged ATKs deal 200.0% ATK of bonus Physical DMG. CD: 6s. [[Asuka]] equip bonus: Charged ATKs deal 40.0% bonus Physical DMG and in enhanced form, the CD drops to 3s.Lang

Cleopatra.name: Cleopatra
Cleopatra.slotT_effect: Gain 28% (41% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier against enemy with broken Elite Shield.
Cleopatra.slotM_effect: Attacks against stunned enemies gain 48% (82% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Cleopatra.slotB_effect: Attacks against paralyzed enemies gain 48% (82% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Cleopatra.setEffect2p: Gain 25% Move Speed. [[Kiana]] or [[Kallen]] equip bonus: Gain 20% Max HP in battle.
Cleopatra.setEffect3p: Enemies further away get hit harder. Ranged attacks gain 5% Physical DMG for every meter of distance to the target. Max stacks: 10.Lang

Cocolia (Stigmata).name: Cocolia (Stigmata)
Cocolia (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gain 11% (20% at 5*) Physical DMG. When an entity summoned by the host is on the field, gain 10% (25% at 5*) Crit DMG.
Cocolia (Stigmata).slotM_effect: Gain 4% (10% at 5*) Max HP in battle. Enemy attacks suffer 9% (15% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction.
Cocolia (Stigmata).slotB_effect: The host gains 7% (13% at 5*) Attack Speed. After Ultimate Evasion, unit summoned by the host gains 19% (40% at 5*) Physical DMG for 6s. CD: 8s.
Cocolia (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Receives a shield when an entity summoned by the host is attacked. When active, the shield provides 50% Total DMG Reduction against incoming attacks and lasts 7s. CD: 21s.
Cocolia (Stigmata).setEffect3p: The Charging Shield explodes when broken, dealing 500% ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies in a large AOE.Lang

Columbus.name: Columbus
Columbus.slotT_effect: Host deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Physical DMG and after landing a Charged ATK, she deals 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) bonus Crit DMG for 4s (can be stacked).
Columbus.slotM_effect: Host deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Total DMG and against single enemies, she deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Crit DMG.
Columbus.slotB_effect: Host has 7.5% (15.0% at 5*) bonus Crit Rate. Every attack against the same target deals 2% (3% at 5*) more Physical DMG (8% [15% at 5*] max). Reset if no attacks in 10s or target changes.
Columbus.setEffect2p: When Charged ATKs hit, if there is no more than one enemy within 8m, host deals 45.0% bonus Total DMG for 6s.
Columbus.setEffect3p: Charged ATKs deal 200.0% ATK of bonus Physical DMG. CD: 6s. [[Asuka]] equip bonus: Charged ATKs deal 40.0% bonus Physical DMG and in enhanced form, the CD drops to 3s.Lang

Dante.name: Dante
Dante.slotT_effect: The host gains 7.0% (15.0% at 5*) Crit Rate. The host gains Mantle when hit by an enemy which boosts her Physical DMG by 4.0% (8.0% at 5*) for 10s; CD: 10s. The host gains Perfect Mantle upon Ultimate Evasion or Retaliation, which boosts her Physical DMG by 8.0% (16.0% at 5*) for 10s; triggering this effect again resets the duration. Perfect Mantle will replace Mantle in cases of overlap.
Dante.slotM_effect: The host gains 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) Physical DMG. The host gains Mantle when hit by an enemy, which boosts her Crit DMG by 7.5% (15.0% at 5*) for 10s; CD: 10s. The host gains Perfect Mantle upon Ultimate Evasion or Retaliation, which boosts her Crit DMG by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) for 10s; triggering this effect again resets the duration. Perfect Mantle will replace Mantle in cases of overlap.
Dante.slotB_effect: The host gains 7.0% (15.0% at 5*) Attack Speed. The host gains Mantle when hit by an enemy, which boosts her Total DMG by 5.0% (10.0% at 5*) for 10s; CD: 10s. The host gains Perfect Mantle upon Ultimate Evasion or Retaliation, which boosts her Total DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) for 10s; triggering this effect again resets the duration. Perfect Mantle will replace Mantle in cases of overlap.
Dante.setEffect2p: The host gains 20.0% Crit DMG. The host gains 30.0% Physical DMG for 10s upon entering Burst mode or hitting an enemy with Charged ATK in Burst mode; triggering this effect again resets the duration. [[Durandal]] equip bonus: CD of Ultimate Evasion / Retaliation shortens by 20%.
Dante.setEffect3p: In Burst mode, the host deals 30.0% more DMG against shields, and her Charged ATKs can impair unimpaired enemies, reducing their DEF by 40.0% for 8s. [[Durandal]] equip bonus: The impairing debuff reduces enemy DEF by 60.0% instead.Lang

Darwin.name: Darwin
Darwin.slotT_effect: For every 15 Combo Hit Count, gain 4% (8% at 5*) Lightning DMG dealt. Stacks up to 4 times. DMG buff applies for current combat (host's death dispels the buff).
Darwin.slotM_effect: For every 1 hit taken by the host, gain 4% (7% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction. Stacks up to 4 times. DMG Reduction buff applies for current combat (host's death dispels the buff).
Darwin.slotB_effect: For every Ultimate Evasion performed by host, gain 3% (6% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 4 times. DMG buff applies for current combat (host's death dispels the buff).
Darwin.setEffect2p: Gains a shield upon entry. The shield disappears upon taking an enemy hit and inflicts a 3s paralysis on nearby enemies. Shield appears again after 10s. When the shield is active, character gains 20% Lightning DMG.
Darwin.setEffect3p: Gain 20% Lightning DMG and 20% faster Move Speed. The shield of the Origin of Shields disappears after taking 2 hits.Lang

Detective Durandal.name: Detective Durandal
Detective Durandal.slotT_effect: After Ultimate Evasion, Charged ATKs deal 10.0% (20.0% at 4*) bonus Total DMG for 5s. CD: 10s.Lang

Dickens.name: Dickens
Dickens.slotT_effect: Boosts Physical DMG by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*). Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs grant 1 charge on hit. 5 charges max. CD: 1s. Ultimate consumes all charges and every charge consumed restores 40.0 HP.
Dickens.slotM_effect: Boosts Physical DMG by 12.0% (30.0%). Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs grant 1 charge on hit. 5 charges max. CD: 1s. Ultimate consumes all charges and every charge consumed deals 60.0% (100% at 5*) ATK of Physical DMG in a small area.
Dickens.slotB_effect: Boost Total DMG by 10.0% (25.0% at 5*). Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs grant 1 charge on hit. 5 charges max. CD: 1s. Ultimate consumes all charges and every charge consumed restores 0.5 (1.0 at 5*) SP.
Dickens.setEffect2p: Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs deal 20.0% bonus Physical DMG and an additional 15.0% bonus Physical DMG against MECH enemies. Casting Ultimate boosts Total DMG of Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs by 20.0% for 8s. Can be refreshed.
Dickens.setEffect3p: Casting Ultimate reduces Total DMG taken by 30.0% and improves Ignore Interrupt for 8s. When equipped by the [[Olenyevas]], charges of individual stigmata start at 5 and max at 8. The starting charge bonus can proc once every 10min in Open World.Lang

Dirac.name: Dirac
Dirac.slotT_effect: Gain 4.0% (10.0% at 5*) Crit Rate. After entry or unleashing weapon skills, host gains another 4.0% (10.0% at 5*) Crit Rate for 9s. This effect cannot stack.
Dirac.slotM_effect: Ultimate/Burst ATKs deal 14.0% (26.0% at 5*) more Total DMG. During Burst mode, the host gains 14.0% (26.0% at 5*) Total DMG, and gain another 0.9% (1.5% at 5*) Total DMG per second after unleashing Ultimate or entering Burst Mode; stacks up to 9 times; lasts 9s, during which the effect cannot be triggered again.
Dirac.slotB_effect: Gain 11.0% (20.0% at 5*) Physical DMG. After Ultimate Evasion or triggering evasion skill, host gains 0.8 (1.5 at 5*) SP/s for 10s. Does not trigger again during this time.
Dirac.setEffect2p: If any 2 stigmata effects are active, gain 35.0% Physical DMG. When this effect is triggered, the durations of both stigmata effects are reset and extended to 14s.
Dirac.setEffect3p: If all 3 stigmata effects are active, Ultimate/Burst mode ATKs also apply Impair to non-impaired enemies on hit, lowering their DEF by 50.0% for 3s. When this effect is triggered, the durations of all 3 stigmata effects are reset and extended to 18s.Lang

Diva Bronya.name: Diva Bronya
Diva Bronya.slotM_effect: When there are two enemies on the battlefield, the host gains 20.0% (30.0% at 4*) Ice DMG.Diva Bronya is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.==Sources==*[[Cybernet Havens]][[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Dracula.name: Dracula
Dracula.slotT_effect: Attacks against bleeding enemies gain 25% (40% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Dracula.slotM_effect: Hits on bleeding enemies recover 1.5% (3.0% at 5*) HP and 1.5% (3.0% at 5*) SP for self. CD: 4s.
Dracula.slotB_effect: For every bleeding enemy on the battlefield, the host gains 6% (12% at 5*) Attack Speed and 2.0% (4.0% at 5*) Crit Rate. Stacks up to 3 times.
Dracula.setEffect2p: Upon scoring a crit hit, summon 1 Kindred that lasts 10s, and resets the duration of all existing Kindreds. The Kindred deals 50% ATK of Physical DMG (DMG is directly based on the host and benefit from the host's stat bonuses). Up to 3 Kindreds can exist at the same time, each increasing the host's Crit DMG by 15%.
Dracula.setEffect3p: When HP is below 1%, activate Revival Mode that lasts 5s, during which the host cannot attack nor move but is invincible and heals 20% of HP per second. When Revival Mode ends, knock surrounding enemies airborne and bleed them for 5s, dealing 20% ATK of Physical DMG per second. CD: 300s.Lang

Dragon Boat.name: Dragon Boat
Dragon Boat.slotT_effect: Combo ATKs gain 10% (20% at 4*) Physical DMG and 3% (5% at 4*) Crit Rate.
Dragon Boat.slotM_effect: Attacks have a 10% chance of paralyzing enemies for 2s. CD: 8s (5s at 4*).
Dragon Boat.slotB_effect: Shortens debuff durations by 15% (30% at 4*). Switch skills (including QTE) gain 15% (25% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Dragon Boat.setEffect2p: Gain 10% Max SP in battle. Gain 10% Max HP in battle.
Dragon Boat.setEffect3p: When HP is above 70%, gain 6% Physical DMG for every 5% of HP exceeded.Lang

Edison.name: Edison
Edison.slotT_effect: Gain 10% (15% at 4*) Lightning DMG. Gain 1 charge every 6s. The next Basic ATK (including Combo and Charged ATKs) deals an additional 76% (120% at 4*) Lightning DMG.
Edison.slotM_effect: Lightning DMG increases by 6% (10% at 4*). Host obtains a barrier every 6s that absorbs 64 (105 at 4*) Physical DMG from the next enemy hit.
Edison.slotB_effect: Entities summoned by the host gain 19% (30% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier. Charges once every 6s. The next Basic ATK (including Combo and Charged ATKs) inflicts 19% (30% at 4*) Move Slow on the enemy for 4s.
Edison.setEffect2p: Gain 1 charge every 12s. Next Basic ATK (including Combo and Charged ATK) gains 50% Total DMG Multiplier. Host also gains 15% Total DMG Multiplier for 6s.

Edwin Hubble.name: Edwin Hubble
Edwin Hubble.slotT_effect: After an attack, generate a Frozen Nova explosion at the target's original position, freezing nearby enemies for 0.5s (1.0s at 5*) and dealing a one-time 200% (300% at 5*) ATK of Ice DMG. CD: 8.0s.
Edwin Hubble.slotM_effect: Gain 10% (20% at 5*) Ice Resistance. Attacks have a 10% (30% at 5*) change to inflict 10% (20% at 5*) Move Slow on the enemy for 4s. CD: 12s.
Edwin Hubble.slotB_effect: Gain 15% (30% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier against frozen or slowed enemies.
Edwin Hubble.setEffect2p: When attacking slowed enemies, the host gains a 15% Attack Speed buff for 4s. Triggering this again resets the duration.
Edwin Hubble.setEffect3p: Gain 30% Ice DMG. Combo/charged attacks further gain 10% Total DMG Multiplier.Lang

Einstein.name: Einstein
Einstein.slotT_effect: Charged attacks gain 22% (30% at 5*) DMG against shields. At below 33% HP, gain 28% (41% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Einstein.slotM_effect: When charged attacks hit the enemy, heal character for 30 (50 at 5*) HP. CD: 3s. Hits made against MECH-type enemies also restore 1.2 (2.0 at 5*) SP. CD: 3s.
Einstein.slotB_effect: Charged attacks gain 12% (20% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. Hits made against MECH-type enemies accelerates the character's Attack Speed by 11% (15% at 5*) for 3s Triggering this skill again resets the duration.
Einstein.setEffect2p: Gain 5% Total DMG Multiplier for every meter of distance from the enemy. Bonus stacks up to 5 times.
Einstein.setEffect3p: Get Total DMG Reduction when closer to the enemy, up to a max of 40% DMG Reduction.Lang

Einstein: Band.name: Einstein: Band
Einstein: Band.slotT_effect: Summons a robot assistant (summoned entity) to assist in combat and unlocks its laser attack ability that deals substantial Physical DMG. When there are no less than 2 enemies on the battlefield, the host deals 10% (25% at 5*) more Total DMG.
Einstein: Band.slotM_effect: Summons a robot assistant (summoned entity) to assist in combat and unlocks its shockwave attack ability that deals AOE Physical DMG and knocks down the target. When there are no less than 3 enemies on the battlefield, randomly knock a nearby enemy airborne and inflicts a 1s Time Lock on it every 6s.
Einstein: Band.slotB_effect: Summons a robot assistant (summoned entity) to assist in combat and unlock its Flash Grenade ability that deals continuous Physical DMG. When there are no less than 4 enemies on the battlefield, there is a 10% (25% at5*) chance for the host to ignore DMG taken.
Einstein: Band.setEffect2p: Robot assistant's Flash Bomb, Shockwave, and Laser attacks have a 30% chance of dealing DMG 2 times.
Einstein: Band.setEffect3p: Removes the enemy number restrictions from all stigmata skills in this stigmata set. The host's attacks gain 15% Total DMG Multiplier.Lang

Ekaterina.name: Ekaterina
Ekaterina.slotT_effect: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 25, gain 44% (61% at 5*) DEF in battle.
Ekaterina.slotM_effect: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 40, gain 32% (41% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Ekaterina.slotB_effect: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 10, gain 18% (31% at 5*) Move Speed.
Ekaterina.setEffect2p: Gain 15% CRT in battle. MECH-type battlesuit equip bonus: Gain 15% Max SP in battle.
Ekaterina.setEffect3p: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 70, gain 120% Crit DMG.Lang

Elizabeth Bathory.name: Elizabeth Bathory
Elizabeth Bathory.slotT_effect: Gain 3% (5% at 4*) Crit Rate. At above 80% HP, also gain 19% (31% at 4*) DEF during combat.
Elizabeth Bathory.slotM_effect: Gain 6% (10% at 4*) Physical DMG. At above 80% HP, gain 6% (10% at 4*) Physical DMG buff during combat.
Elizabeth Bathory.slotB_effect: At 80% or higher HP, gain 26% (41% at 4*) Move Speed.
Elizabeth Bathory.setEffect2p: Gains 20% Physical DMG.BIO equip bonus: Gains another 10% Max SP.
Elizabeth Bathory.setEffect3p: Host gains 15% faster ATK Speed. Hits have a 10% chance to heal 3% HP. CD: 2s.Lang

Elysia (Stigmata).name: Elysia (Stigmata)
Elysia (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Physical DMG increases by 12.0% (25.0% at 5*). Crit DMG from Basic/Combo/Charged ATKs increases by 10% (20.0% at 5*).
Elysia (Stigmata).slotM_effect: Physical DMG increases by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*). Ultimate Evasion Skill has 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) shorter CD.
Elysia (Stigmata).slotB_effect: Total DMG increases by 12.0% (25.0% at 5*) and Crit DMG increases by 8.0% (15.0% at 5*). Charged ATKs boosts Crit DMG by 8.0% (15.0% at 5*) on hit for 15s.
Elysia (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Total DMG increases by 25.0%. On hit, Charged ATKs make every attack in the next 5s deal 20.0% ATK of Physical DMG (can only be triggered once every 0.3s on each target). Host takes 20.0% less Total DMG from enemies within 5 meters.
Elysia (Stigmata).setEffect3p: Crit DMG from ranged attacks increases by 30.0%. Casting Ultimate makes ranged attacks deal 20.0% ATK of bonus Physical DMG (can only be triggered once every 0.3s on each target) for 10.0s (hitting enemies with Charged ATKs extends the duration by 1s for up to 10s of extension). Charged ATKs restore 200 HP on hit. CD: 5s.Lang

Eternal Love.name: Eternal Love
Eternal Love.slotM_effect: Gain 13% (20% at 4*) Max HP in battle.[[Kiana]] equip bonus: Mei gains 6% (8% at 4*) Physical DMG on the field.[[Mei]] equip bonus: Kiana gains 6% (8% at 4*) Physical DMG on the field.Effect cannot be stacked.Eternal Love is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.==Sources=====Time-limited===2019:*[[A Valentine's Day only for us]][[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Formals.name: Formals
Formals.slotT_effect: Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gain 10% (20% at 5*) Physical DMG. At Dance Level 2 or higher, gain 10% (20% at 5*) Crit DMG.
Formals.slotM_effect: Gain 10% (20% at 5*) Elemental DMG. At Dance Level 1 or higher, take 10% (20% at 5*) less indirect Physical DMG.

Formals.setEffect3p: When the Dance Level reaches 3, attacks will cause an explosion, dealing 300% ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies. CD: 6s.Lang

Fu Hua Musician.name: Fu Hua Musician

Fu Hua Musician.slotM_effect: After exit, team gains 5% (10% at 5*) Fire DMG. This effect cannot stack. When on the field, the host gains 5% (10% at 5*) All Elemental Resistance.

Fu Hua Musician.setEffect3p: Gain 30% Fire DMG and 20% Max HP in battle.Lang

Fu Hua Outing.name: Fu Hua Outing
Fu Hua Outing.slotB_effect: [[Fu Hua]] equip bonus: Gain 5% (15% at 4*) Attack Speed and 10% (20% at 4*) Move Speed.Lang

Fu Hua: Margrave.name: Fu Hua: Margrave
Fu Hua: Margrave.slotT_effect: Deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) more Fire DMG; with Fyreheart active, all team members gain 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) Fire, Ice and Lightning DMG. This effect cannot stack.
Fu Hua: Margrave.slotM_effect: Deals 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) more Fire DMG; with Fyreheart active, all team members heal 10 (20 at 5*) HP per second. This effect cannot stack.
Fu Hua: Margrave.slotB_effect: ATK Speed increases by 10.0% (20% at 5*); with Fyreheart active, all enemies less than 40 meters away from any team member suffer Warhaunt (effect does not stack), taking 7.0% (14.0% at 5*) more Total DMG.
Fu Hua: Margrave.setEffect2p: Deals 30.0% more Fire DMG; after spending no less than 25 SP in once action, the team gains Fyreheart for 18s (triggering this again resets the duration).
Fu Hua: Margrave.setEffect3p: When spending no less than 60/120 SP in one action, Fyreheart triggered thereupon causes enemies affected by Warhaunt to take 17.0%/20.0% more Total DMG (Warhaunt effect does not stack). [[Fu Hua]] equip bonus: Minimum SP cost to activate Fyreheart is reduced to 15.Lang

Fu Hua: Pride.name: Fu Hua: Pride
Fu Hua: Pride.slotB_effect: Gain 15% (30% at 5*) Melee Physical DMG. For every enemy kill, hits on the host gain 7% Total DMG Multiplier for 30s. Stacks up to 10 times.Lang

Fu Hua: Snowgazing.name: Fu Hua: Snowgazing
Fu Hua: Snowgazing.slotT_effect: For 5 seconds, Total DMG increases by 6.0% (12.0% at 4*) when receiving DMG. Restores 80.0 (150.0 at 4*) HP afterwards. CD: 20s.Fu Hua: Snowgazing is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.==Sources==*[[Casual Fishing]][[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Fuxi (Stigmata).name: Fuxi (Stigmata)

Galileo.name: Galileo

Galileo.setEffect3p: Receive 40% less Indirect Physical DMG (such as bleeding).Lang

Gemina's Date.name: Gemina's Date

Gemina's Tour.name: Gemina's Tour

Gemina: Spring.name: Gemina: Spring

Gustav Klimt.name: Gustav Klimt

Hanabi Fireworks.name: Hanabi Fireworks

Hanabi Fireworks.setEffect3p: Gain 10% Crit Rate and 60% Crit DMG to self.Lang

Handel.name: Handel

Handel.slotB_effect: Lightning DMG increases by 10.0% (35.0% at 5*). Landing Combo/Charged ATKs increases Total DMG by 10.0% (15.0% at 5*) and restores 0.5 (1.0 at 5*) SP/s for 10s (can be refreshed).
Handel.setEffect2p: Lightning DMG increases by 30.0%. Casting Ultimate triggers the effects of all equipped stigma pieces (triggering it again refreshes the duration).

Hannah.name: Hannah

Hannah.slotM_effect: Switch skill (and QTE) gain 7% (10% at 3*) Physical DMG.
Hannah.slotB_effect: Switch skill (and QTE) gain 7% (10% at 3*) Physical DMG.
Hannah.setEffect2p: Gain 15% Melee Physical DMG.[[Kiana]] or [[Kallen]] equip bonus: Gain 5% Max HP in battle.
