Holmes.setEffect2p: Host attacks inflict a 5s Sanguine Stain on bleeding enemies, making them take 20.0% bonus Physical DMG (cannot stack).

Homecoming Theater.name: Homecoming Theater
Homecoming Theater.slotT_effect: For hits on enemies, the host gains 5% (10% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction for 15s. CD: 5s. Stacks up to 3 times. New stacks do not reset duration. Starts battle with 3-stack buff.
Homecoming Theater.slotM_effect: Gain 10% (30% at 5*) Melee Physical DMG. Hits taken by the host also gain 20% Melee Physical DMG.
Homecoming Theater.slotB_effect: Upon scoring a crit hit, the host gains 4% (8% at 5*) Physical DMG and 4% (8% at 5*) Move Speed for 15s. CD: 5s. Stacks up to 3 times. New stacks do not reset duration. Starts battle with 3-stack buff.
Homecoming Theater.setEffect2p: When the host kills an enemy, summon a Kindred (summoned entity); CD: 5s. For every Kindred present, the host gains 10% Total DMG Multiplier. Up to 3 Kindreds can exist at the same time. With 3 Kindreds, the host gains Physical Immunity; the host will lose the immunity buff and all Kindreds when hit by an enemy, for the next 40s, no more Kindreds can be summoned.
Homecoming Theater.setEffect3p: With 3 Kindreds, the host gains a one-time 20% Total DMG Multiplier buff for 10s. When all Kindreds disappear, the host gains immediate healing of 2% Max HP/s for 10s.Lang

HOMU.name: HOMU
HOMU.slotT_effect: When Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) hit an enemy, there is a 30% (50% at 4*) chance of dropping HOMU Coins (CD: 4s). For each HOMU Coin picked up, the host gains 5% (10% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier for 10 sec. Stacks up to 3 times.
HOMU.slotM_effect: Extends pick-up ranges of all allies by 0.5 (1.5 at 4*) meters.
HOMU.setEffect2p: After picking up 1 HOMU Coins consecutively, generate a BOOM HOMU on the spot that explodes after a delay, dealing 400% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies within a 4-meter radius.
HOMU.setEffect3p: After picking up 3 HOMU Coins consecutively, the host heals 10% HP and gains 10% SP.Lang

HOMU: Gym.name: HOMU: Gym
HOMU: Gym.slotM_effect: Switch (and QTE) skills deal 10.0% (15.0% at 4*) more Physical DMG. After entry, host takes 10.0% (20.0% at 4*) less Physical DMG for 10s. Does not trigger again for this duration.Lang

Idol Raven.name: Idol Raven
Idol Raven.slotT_effect: Elemental DMG increases by 5.0% (12.0% at 5*). [[Mei]]/[[Raven]] equip bonus: Host takes 6.0% (15.0% at 5*) less Elemental DMG.
Idol Raven.slotM_effect: Move Speed increases by 6.0% (12.0% at 5*). [[Mei]]/[[Raven]] equip bonus: Attacks slow enemy Move Speed by 5.0% (10.0% at 5*) for 5.0s. CD: 10s.
Idol Raven.slotB_effect: Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs deal 5.0% (10.0% at 5*) bonus Total DMG. [[Mei]]/[[Raven]] equip bonus: Total DMG taken reduces by 6.0% (15.0% at 5*).
Idol Raven.setEffect2p: Total DMG increases by 15.0%. Max HP increases by 15.0%.
Idol Raven.setEffect3p: ATK Speed increases by 10.0%. SP cap increases by 10.0%.Lang

Immortal Attire.name: Immortal Attire
Immortal Attire.slotT_effect: Gain 5% (20% at 5*) Lightning and Fire DMG, and gain 15% (30% at 5*) Ice DMG.
Immortal Attire.slotM_effect: Take 6% (15% at 5*) less Physical DMG, and attacks gain 12% (30% at 5*) Crit DMG.
Immortal Attire.slotB_effect: Upon scoring a crit hit, heal self for 80 (200 at 5*) HP. CD: 6s.
Immortal Attire.setEffect2p: Each Combo/Charged ATK (CD: 1s) adds 1 charge. At 4 charges, the host enters Mist Form for 6s (CD: 20s; all charges will be removed when Mist Form ends). Mist Form: Deals 600 Physical DMG against a random enemy within 6-meter radius of self every 0.25s; each target will take no more than 1 hit in each 0.5s span.
Immortal Attire.setEffect3p: When the Mist effect ends, heal every ally for 30 HP/s for 6s.Lang

Irene Adler.name: Irene Adler
Irene Adler.slotT_effect: Boosts Lightning DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). With host on standby, team deals 8.0% (12.0% at 5*) bonus Elemental DMG (cannot stack).
Irene Adler.slotM_effect: Boosts Lightning DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Host takes 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) less Total DMG.
Irene Adler.slotB_effect: Boost Total DMG by 8.0% (15.0% at 5*). Charged and Ultimate ATKs Bewitch enemies hit and make them take 8.0% (15.0% at 5*) bonus Elemental DMG for 18s (cannot stack but can be refreshed).
Irene Adler.setEffect2p: Boosts Total DMG by 15.0%. Team deals 18.0% bonus Elemental DMG against Bewitched enemies.
Irene Adler.setEffect3p: Charged and QTE ATKs boost team Lightning DMG by 10.0% on hit for 20s (subsequent procs reset the duration). When equipped by [[Rita]], her Total DMG is boosted by 25.0%.Lang

Isaac Newton.name: Isaac Newton
Isaac Newton.slotT_effect: Gain 29% (46% at 5*) Melee Physical DMG. When hit by enemies 2 times, impose a 10.0s CD for this buff.
Isaac Newton.slotM_effect: Upon being hit and injured by an enemy, gain 24% (41% at 5*) Move Speed and a shield that absorbs 12% (21% at 5*) Max HP worth of incoming DMG. Shield duration: 4.0s. CD: 15s.
Isaac Newton.slotB_effect: Attacks on the enemy initiates Challenge Mode that lasts 5.0s. During Challenge Mode, attacks gain 28% (41% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier but hits taken also gain 22% (31% at 5*). CD: 10s.
Isaac Newton.setEffect2p: Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) have a 10% chance to inflict one the following debuffs for 6.0s: paralyze, freeze, stun, slow, ignite, impair, and weaken. CD: 2.0s.
Isaac Newton.setEffect3p: For every 1.0s, Basic ATK (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gains 20% Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 5 times. Attacking resets the buff and initiates a 7s CD.Lang

Ishikawa Goemon.name: Ishikawa Goemon
Ishikawa Goemon.slotT_effect: The host gains 1 stack of Dance Art when dealing DMG with Melee ATKs; each stack provides 3.0% (5.0% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction and boosts Lightning DMG by 3.0% (7.0% at 5*) (Lightning DMG increases by another 3.0% [5.0% at 5*] under Kenbu mode). Max stacks: 3. Stack CD: 5s. The host loses 1 stack when attacked, but will not more stacks within the next 3s.
Ishikawa Goemon.slotM_effect: Total DMG increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Upon unleashing Ultimate, the host's Lightning DMG increases by 5.0% (15.0% at 5*) (Lightning DMG increases by another 5.0% [10.0% at 5*] under Kenbu mode) for 6s. CD: 18s.
Ishikawa Goemon.slotB_effect: The host deals 10.0% (35.0% at 5*) more Lightning DMG. The first attack unleashed after Ultimate Evasion deals an additional 30.0% (60.0% at 5*) ATK of Lightning DMG (deals another 30.0% [60.0% at 5*] ATK of Lightning DMG under Kenbu mode). CD: 8s.
Ishikawa Goemon.setEffect2p: The host enters Kenbu mode when hitting an enemy with Combo ATKs, under which her Total DMG increases by 30.00% for 7s. CD: 10s.
Ishikawa Goemon.setEffect3p: The host gains 30.0% Total DMG Reduction and Interrupt Immunity when attacked. CD: 15s. The host restores 400 HP every 20s at below 50% HP.Lang

Jin Shengtan.name: Jin Shengtan
Jin Shengtan.slotT_effect: Gain 20% (40% at 5*) DEF in battle. Allies in the Blue Phoenix field gain 10% (15% at 5*) Elemental DMG. This effect cannot stack.
Jin Shengtan.slotM_effect: After exit, team gains 6% (15% at 5*) Ice Resistance and 6% (15% at 5*) Ice DMG (effect cannot stack). When on the field, the host gains 20% (35% at 5*) Ice DMG.
Jin Shengtan.slotB_effect: Gain 6% (15% at 5*) Attack Speed. Allies in the Blue Phoenix field gain 10% (20% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction. This effect cannot stack.
Jin Shengtan.setEffect2p: Attacks create a Blue Phoenix field that lasts for 6s (cannot stack). CD: 9s. Allies within the field gain 30% Elemental DMG, while enemies within take 10% bonus Elemental DMG.
Jin Shengtan.setEffect3p: Extends the duration of the Blue Phoenix field by 3s. Allies within the field receive Ice Protection. When damage taken is less than 10 Ã— Valkyrie's Level, host will only take damage and not be interrupted.Lang

Jingwei.name: Jingwei
Jingwei.slotT_effect: Where there are no more than 1 enemies on the battlefield, gain 18% (31% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Jingwei.slotM_effect: When there are no more than 3 enemies on the battlefield, the host gains 18% (31% at 5*) Move Speed. After hitting an enemy with Charged/Combo ATK, the host gains 28% (40% at 5*) Fire DMG for 5s. Triggering this skill again resets the duration.
Jingwei.slotB_effect: When there are no more than 2 enemies on the battlefield, gain 24% (41% at 5*) DEF in battle. When undeployed and having less than 50% HP, then heal 12 (20 at 5*) HP/s.
Jingwei.setEffect2p: For every ignited or firebranded enemy, gain 10% Attack Speed. Stacks up to 5 times.
Jingwei.setEffect3p: When having a target, all enemies except for the target deal 70% less DMG to the host.Lang

Jixuanyuan.name: Jixuanyuan
Jixuanyuan.slotT_effect: Switch skill (and QTE) gain 36% (62% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Jixuanyuan.slotM_effect: Charged ATKs gain 23% (36% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Jixuanyuan.slotB_effect: Weapon's active skills gain 24% (41% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Jixuanyuan.setEffect2p: Shortens debuffs duration by 50%. [[Mei]], [[Yae Sakura]], or [[Himeko]] equip bonus: Gain 20% Max HP in battle.
Jixuanyuan.setEffect3p: Charges once every 5s. For the next Basic, Combo, or Charged ATK and a short period after that 80% Physical DMG and 50% Crit Rate.Lang

Jixuanyuan Aqua.name: Jixuanyuan Aqua
Jixuanyuan Aqua.slotT_effect: Combo ATKs gain 9% (15% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Jixuanyuan Aqua.slotM_effect: Charged ATKs gain 8% (15% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Jixuanyuan Aqua.slotB_effect: Switch skill (and QTE) gain 19% (31% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Jixuanyuan Aqua.setEffect2p: Gain 10% Total DMG Multiplier against enemy with broken Elite Shield.

Jonin Sakura.name: Jonin Sakura
Jonin Sakura.slotM_effect: Physical DMG increases by 4% (10.0% at 4*) for 10s for each enemy kill. Max stacks: 2. Each stack gained resets the duration.Lang

Kafka.name: Kafka
Kafka.slotT_effect: Upon scoring a Crit hit, the host gains a 1.3% (2.5% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier and 1.3% (2.5% at 5*) Crit DMG buff for 5s (Max stack: 8). Duration of each stack will not be affected by other stacks.
Kafka.slotM_effect: Upon scoring a Crit hit, the host gains a 2.9% (5.0% at 5*) Physical DMG buff for 5s (Max stack: 8). Duration of each stack will not be affected by other stacks.
Kafka.slotB_effect: Upon scoring a Crit hit, the host gains a 1.6% (2.5% at 5*) Crit Rate buff for 5s (Max stack: 8). Duration of each stack will not be affected by other stacks.
Kafka.setEffect2p: Charged ATKs directly trigger max-stacks effects of a stigma and gives the host a 45% Total DMG Multiplier buff for 12s. CD: 20s.
Kafka.setEffect3p: Gain 35% Total DMG Reduction against hits taken. Within 12s after unleashing a Charged ATK, each attack has a 60% chance to trigger a bonus strike that deals 15% ATK of Physical DMG, has 100% higher Crit Rate, and is added to the Combo Hit counter. Triggers 30 times only. CD: 20s.Lang

Kallen - Hawaii.name: Kallen - Hawaii
Kallen - Hawaii.slotM_effect: Gain 20% (40% at 4*) DEF in battle. [[Theresa]] equip bonus: Summoned units gain 5% (15% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier.Kallen - Hawaii is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.==Sources==*Time Capsule[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Kallen - Hymn.name: Kallen - Hymn
Kallen - Hymn.slotT_effect: For the host and units summoned by the host: Attacks gain 15% (20% at 5*) Physical DMG. Attacks against impaired enemies further gain 6% (12% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Kallen - Hymn.slotM_effect: Upon entering battle, host obtains a Grace Shield that reduces 150 (400 at 5*) incoming Physical DMG from enemy hits, after which the barrier enters a 6s CD. While the barrier lasts, host takes 20% (30% at 5*) less indirect Physical DMG.
Kallen - Hymn.slotB_effect: For every impaired enemy on the battlefield, the host gains 3% (6% at 5*) Attack Speed and 5% Crit DMG. Stacks up to 4 times.
Kallen - Hymn.setEffect2p: Spend at least 15, 70, and 125 SP at once to gain 8%, 15%, and 22% Total DMG Multiplier respectively for the entire team. Lasts 7s. Effect cannot stack.
Kallen - Hymn.setEffect3p: When hitting an impaired enemy, the host heals for 8% HP and gains 5% SP. CD: 8s.Lang

Kallen Pledge.name: Kallen Pledge
Kallen Pledge.slotT_effect: When Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) hit a target, there is a 26% (52% at 5*) chance of dealing 72% (123% at 5*) ATK of Physical DMG to the target and surrounding enemies. CD: 2.0s.
Kallen Pledge.slotM_effect: Gain 20% Max HP. 18% (31% at 5*) chance of directly ignoring a debuff.
Kallen Pledge.slotB_effect: Gain 12% (21% at 5*) Physical DMG against elite enemies, and take 12% (21% at 5*) less Physical DMG from attacks of elite enemies.
Kallen Pledge.setEffect2p: For every Elite enemy on the battlefield, the host gains 8% Crit Rate. Stacks up to 4 times.
Kallen Pledge.setEffect3p: For every elite killed, Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) of the host gain 15% Physical DMG. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 120s (adding a stack does not refresh the duration).Lang

Kallen's Ambition.name: Kallen's Ambition
Kallen's Ambition.slotT_effect: Lightning DMG of the host's Melee ATKs increases by 5% (30.0% at 5*). [[Yae Sakura]] equip bonus: SP regen rate increases by 2.0% (5.0% at 5*). Lang

Kepler.name: Kepler
Kepler.slotT_effect: Upon scoring a crit strike, deal an additional 110% (200% at 5*) ATK of Physical DMG to the target and surrounding enemies within a 3-meter radius. CD: 3.0s.
Kepler.slotM_effect: Upon scoring a crit strike, paralyzes the target and surrounding enemies within a 3-meter radius for 2.0s. CD: 7.0s (4.0s at 5*).
Kepler.slotB_effect: Upon scoring a crit strike, heals self for 130 (250 for 5*) HP. CD: 6.0s.
Kepler.setEffect3p: Critical strikes mark non-Boss enemies for Judgment. These enemies then take 15% ATK of Physical DMG per second for 30s. CD: 5s. For every enemy marked for Judgment, gain 6% Crit Rate. Stacks up to 5 times.Lang

Kiana - Delivery Girl.name: Kiana - Delivery Girl
Kiana - Delivery Girl.slotT_effect: A Basic Attack will generate a Family Feast bucket in the same place (CD: 5s). After a delay of 2s, it will explode, causing 180% ATK of Physical Damage to the enemies in the explosion range, and the teammates in the explosion range will recover 45 HP.
Kiana - Delivery Girl.slotM_effect: After triggering Ultimate Evasion, enter the Pizza Satisfaction state, recovering 2% HP/s, with a 12s cooldown.
Kiana - Delivery Girl.slotB_effect: Increases Movement Speed by 10% and Defense by 10%.
Kiana - Delivery Girl.setEffect2p: Fire elemental damage taken is reduced by 20%; when the damage taken is less than constant 8 of Valkyrie level, the hit does not interrupt the owner.
Kiana - Delivery Girl.setEffect3p: Increase 30% HP limit in battle.Kiana - Delivery Girl is from 2018 collaboration between ''KFC'' / ''Pizza Hut'' and ''Honkai Impact 3rd'' in China. The set cannot be seen in codex unless obtained.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Kiana Diva.name: Kiana Diva
Kiana Diva.slotM_effect: Upon Ultimate Evasion, all allies heal for 6 (12 at 5*) HP/s for 7s. Triggering this again resets the duration.[[Kiana]] equip bonus: Heals 4.0 (12.7 at 5*) HP/s whether on or off the field.Lang

Kiana: Camping.name: Kiana: Camping
Kiana: Camping.slotB_effect: The host gains 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) Move Speed. Gains another 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) Move Speed for 10s when picking up SP Pack, HP Pack and Coins. Triggering it again resets the duration.Kiana: Camping is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.==Sources==*[[Forest of Fireflies]][[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Kiana: Casuals.name: Kiana: Casuals
Kiana: Casuals.slotT_effect: When on the field and in combat, the host heals for 8 (15 at 4*) HP/s. [[Kiana]] equip bonus: Gain 10% (20% at 4*) Max HP in battle.Kiana: Casuals is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''. The stigma could be found translated in the [[Version 5.7]] beta for global servers.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Kiana: Neko Birthday.name: Kiana: Neko Birthday
Kiana: Neko Birthday.slotB_effect: Gains 10.0% (16.0% at 4*) Max HP and 4.0% (10.0% at 4*) Physical DMG Reduction in battle.Lang

Kinderfest.name: Kinderfest
Kinderfest.slotT_effect: If [[Kiana]] / [[Mei]] / [[Bronya]] is on the team, the host gain 9% (15% at 5*) Physical DMG / 16% (25% at 5*) Lightning DMG / 16% (25% at 5*) Ice DMG respectively.Lang

Kitten Fun.name: Kitten Fun
Kitten Fun.slotT_effect: The host gains 7.0% (15.0% at 4*) Fire DMG. Her Combo and Charged ATK deal 7.0% (15.0% at 4*) more Fire DMG.
Kitten Fun.slotM_effect: The host restores 15.0 (30.0 at 4*) HP per second at below 50% HP.
Kitten Fun.slotB_effect: The host gains 7.0% (15.0% at 4*) ATK Speed and 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) Move Speed.
Kitten Fun.setEffect2p: Ultimate and Burst ATKs deal 20.0% more Total DMG.
Kitten Fun.setEffect3p: The host gains 15.0% Total DMG Reduction. [[Rita]] or [[Durandal]] equip bonus: Gains another 15.0% Total DMG Reduction.Lang

Leeuwenhoek.name: Leeuwenhoek
Leeuwenhoek.slotT_effect: The host gains 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) Fire DMG. For every 10% HP lost, the host gains a buff that boosts her Total DMG by 2.0% (4.0% at 5*) (Max: 4 stacks); the max 4 stacks will directly take effect when the host unleashes Throw or triggers the 2-pc bonus; duration: 10s.
Leeuwenhoek.slotM_effect: The host gains 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) Total DMG. Ultimate Evasion boosts her Fire DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) for 10s; triggering this effect again resets the duration.
Leeuwenhoek.slotB_effect: The host gains 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) Fire DMG. The host's switch entry and attacks against ignited enemies boost her Total DMG by 12.0% (25.0% at 5*) for 10s; triggering this effect again resets the duration.
Leeuwenhoek.setEffect2p: The host gains 15.0% Total DMG. When unleashing Ultimate, all enemies on the battlefield take 15.0% more Fire DMG from the host for 12s and force-activates the 1-pc buffs of this stigma set; CD: 20s.
Leeuwenhoek.setEffect3p: The host gains 2.0% Total DMG Reduction each time she ignites an enemy; stacks up to 15 times; effect lasts until the battle ends. [[Durandal]] equip bonus: Auto-triggers the 2-pc bonus when entering the battlefield.Lang

Liebig.name: Liebig
Liebig.slotT_effect: Triggering Ultimate Evasion or Ultimate Evasion skill boosts Physical DMG by ?% (25% at 5*) for 4s. Can be stacked. Team restores ? (150 at 5*) HP when attacking enemies in Warhaunt. CD: 5s.
Liebig.slotM_effect: Ultimate Evasion skill CD is reduced by ?% (20% at 5*). Team deals ?% (12% at 5*) bonus Physical DMG to enemies in Warhaunt.
Liebig.slotB_effect: Basic, Charged, and Combo ATKs deal ?% (25% at 5*) bonus Physical DMG. Combo and Charged ATKs inflict Warhaunt on all enemies (unique effect, cannot stack) and make them take ?% (12% at 5*) bonus Total DMG for 15s. CD: 20s.
Liebig.setEffect2p: The host gain 12% Crit Rate. When the bottom piece of this stigma set triggers Warhaunt, if there is only 1 enemy present, the enemy takes 9% more Physical DMG; if there is 2 or more enemies present, the enemies take 12% more Physical DMG.
Liebig.setEffect3p: Removes the CD of Warhaunt triggered by the bottom piece of this set and reduces Total DMG taken by the team by 10%. When it's equipped by [[Shadow Dash]], she deals 25% bonus Total DMG and her Ultimate inflicts Warhaunt on enemies hit.Liebig is an unreleased stigmata in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''. It was originally supposed to be part of [[Version 4.0]] where it was unofficially known as "Broken Sword" set, but was replaced by [[Shuijing]].Liebig became a part of [[Version 4.2]] beta where it was removed while the beta was still going on. Players expected it to be released in [[Version 4.3]] instead, but an official announcement countered any such claims/hopes. When asked if the stigmata will be available later, the summarized answer was "no, it won't".Honkai Impact Official Discord, CN discussion channels https://discord.com/channels/418652140454674432/435687797626634241/756106914533736459==Speculations==Speculation*The stigmata set was considered overpowered and would've allowed [[Danzai Spectramancer]] to outperform [[Starlit Astrologos]] with [[Shuijing]] as physical support. Its first iteration was even being dubbed "Physical [[Fu Hua - Margrave

Lier.name: Lier
Lier.slotT_effect: At 80% or higher HP, gain 61% (103% at 5*) DEF in battle.
Lier.slotM_effect: At 60% or higher HP, gain 23% (36% at 5*) Move Speed.
Lier.slotB_effect: At 100% or higher HP, gain 29% (46% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Lier.setEffect2p: 15% chance of heal 5% HP upon hitting a target. CD: 2s. BIO-type battlesuit equip bonus: Gain 15% Max SP in battle.
Lier.setEffect3p: Blocks an interruptible attack 1 time and knocks the enemy Airborne. CD: 5s.Lang

Lier Scarlet.name: Lier Scarlet
Lier Scarlet.slotT_effect: Reduce Max HP by 20% in battle, but Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gain 23% (36% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Lier Scarlet.slotM_effect: Reduce Max HP by 15% in battle, but nearby enemies take 61% (103% at 5*) ATK of Physical per second while the host heals 12 (20 at 5*) HP every 3s.
Lier Scarlet.slotB_effect: Reduce Max HP by 15% in battle, but the host gains 11% (15% at 5*) faster Move Speed and 16% (20% at 5*) faster Attack Speed.
Lier Scarlet.setEffect2p: When hit by enemy, take 25% less Physical DMG and 70% less Indirect Physical DMG (such as Bleeding).
Lier Scarlet.setEffect3p: Triggered when HP is 5% or less. Gain 80% Crit Rate and Crit DMG and death immunity for 6s. CD: 60s.Lang

Linnaeus.name: Linnaeus
Linnaeus.slotT_effect: Host and her summoned entities deal 15.0% (24.0% at 5*) bonus Total DMG, and further 8.0% (15.0% at 5*) bonus Total DMG for 3.5s after landing a Combo ATK.
Linnaeus.slotM_effect: Host and her summoned entities deal 20.0% (45.0% at 5*) bonus Lightning DMG. Host takes 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) less DMG from enemies 3 meters away or further.
Linnaeus.slotB_effect: Basic, Combo, and Charged ATKs deal 20.0% (36.0% at 5*) bonus Lightning DMG. With friendly summoned entities present, host restores 0.5 (1.0 at 5*) SP per second when deployed.
Linnaeus.setEffect2p: When host summons an entity, she and the summoned entity are enhanced and Lightning DMG increases by 60.0% for 15s. Triggering it again resets the duration. Enemy presence within 5 meters boosts host's Move Speed by 25%.
Linnaeus.setEffect3p: Ranged ATKs deal 40.0% bonus Total DMG. For every summoned entity, ELF, or Support Valkyrie present, they and host deal 6.0% bonus Total DMG (5 stacks max).Lang

Lucia.name: Lucia
Lucia.slotT_effect: Charged attacks gain 4% (5% at 3*) Physical DMG.
Lucia.slotM_effect: Charged attacks gain 4% (5% at 3*) Physical DMG.
Lucia.slotB_effect: Charged attacks gain 4% (5% at 3*) Physical DMG.
Lucia.setEffect2p: Gain 15% Ranged Physical DMG.[[Bronya]] equip bonus: Gain 5% Max HP in battle.

Marco Polo.name: Marco Polo
Marco Polo.slotT_effect: Gain 5% (15% at 5*) Physical DMG. When Combo Hit Count exceeds 25 (30 at 5*), gain another 5% (15% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Marco Polo.slotM_effect: Gain 10% (25% at 5*) Crit DMG. When Combo Hit Count exceeds 25 (30 at 5*), gain another 10% (25% at 5*) Crit DMG.
Marco Polo.slotB_effect: Gain 5% (11% at 5*) Crit Rate. When Combo Hit Count exceeds 25 (30 at 5*), Combo or Charged ATKs recover 2.5 (5.0 at 5*) more SP when hitting the enemy. CD: 10s.
Marco Polo.setEffect2p: When Combo Hit exceeds 25, Combo or Charged ATKs deal 250% ATK of bonus Physical DMG on hit. CD: 5s.
Marco Polo.setEffect3p: When Combo Hit exceeds 25 host heals 200 HP per 5s.Lang

Mary Shelley.name: Mary Shelley
Mary Shelley.slotT_effect: Gain 15% Max HP in battle and attacks deal another 40% (50% at 5*) of host's max HP of Physical DMG (maxed at 6000, but can be affected by other abilities). CD: 5s (3s at 5*).
Mary Shelley.slotM_effect: Gain 5% Max HP in battle. At the start of battle, the host receives a spirit shield that absorbs up to 15% (25% at 5*) of max HP of any DMG. After the shield is broken, it will take effect again after 40s (30s at 5*).
Mary Shelley.slotB_effect: Gain 10% Max HP in battle. When the host is on the field and in combat, team gains 20 (40 at 5*) DEF every 5s. Stacks 5 times. Effect cannot stack. Buff is effective throughout the battle.
Mary Shelley.setEffect2p: When enemies are nearby, release an electro discharge every 4s, dealing 40% max HP of Lightning DMG to enemies in the AOE (at 15,000 or higher max HP, treat HP as 15,000) and store an Energy Mark.
Mary Shelley.setEffect3p: When gaining 7 Energy Marks, enter Frankenstein Mode upon hitting an enemy with a Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs). Frankenstein Mode: The host gains 40% Total DMG Multiplier and heals team for 2% HP/s for 10s. Energy mark is reset to zero when Frankenstein Mode ends.Lang

Mei Diva.name: Mei Diva
Mei Diva.slotM_effect: Gain 10% (20% at 4*) Crit DMG.[[Mei]] equip bonus: Gain another 10% (20% at 4Star) Crit DMG.Lang

Mei's Birthday.name: Mei's Birthday
Mei's Birthday.slotB_effect: The host gains 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) Lightning DMG, and another 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) against paralyzed enemies.Lang

Mei: Bride.name: Mei: Bride
Mei: Bride.slotM_effect: [[Mei]] equip bonus: Mei takes 14% (26% at 4*) less All Elemental DMG. When there are nearby enemies, gain 19% (31% at 4*) Move Speed.Lang

Mei: Demon.name: Mei: Demon
Mei: Demon.slotM_effect: Upon enemy kill, gain 3% (4% at 4*) Move Speed and 4% (6% at 4*) Melee Physical DMG for 10s. This DMG buff stacks up to 4 times (up to 5 times when equipped on [[Mei]]).Lang

Mei: Office Lady.name: Mei: Office Lady
Mei: Office Lady.slotM_effect: Host takes 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) less Total DMG.[[Mei]] equip bonus: Ultimate or burst mode attacks deal 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) bonus Lightning DMG.Lang

Mei: Wrath.name: Mei: Wrath
Mei: Wrath.slotM_effect: Converts 282% (408% at 5*) of damage taken into power of anger, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.Lang

Mendeleev.name: Mendeleev
Mendeleev.slotT_effect: Charged ATKs gain 22.0% (40.0% at 5*) Crit DMG.
Mendeleev.slotM_effect: When Charged ATKs hit the enemy, host gains 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction for 3s. Triggering this again resets the duration.
Mendeleev.slotB_effect: Host gains 1.5% (3.0% at 5*) Physical DMG buff per second after entry. Max stacks: 10. Stacks are reset upon exit.
Mendeleev.setEffect2p: When Combo/Charged ATKs hit the enemy, deal another 100.0% ATK of Physical DMG. CD: 1s.
Mendeleev.setEffect3p: When Basic ATKs hit the enemy, enter Discovery State. Discovery State: Host gains Ignore Interrupt and deals 20.0% more Physical DMG. Discovery State ends and enters a 15s CD when Combo Hit chain is disrupted.Lang

Michelangelo.name: Michelangelo
Michelangelo.slotT_effect: Every Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) increases your Physical DMG by 3.6% (7.2% at 5*) for 2s (3s at 5*). Stacks up to 5 times, adding a stack resets the duration of the Physical DMG increase effect.
Michelangelo.slotM_effect: Every Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) increases your Crit Rate by 1.5% (3.0% at 5*) for 2s (3s at 5*). Stacks up to 5 times, adding a stack resets the duration of the Crit Rate increase effect.
Michelangelo.slotB_effect: Every Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) increases your Crit DMG by 8.0% (14.0% at 5*) for 2s (3s at 5*). Stacks up to 5 times, adding a stack resets the duration of the Crit DMG increase effect.
Michelangelo.setEffect2p: The host's attacks gain 15% Total DMG Multiplier. Upon entering the battlefield, further gain 15% Total DMG Multiplier for 15s. CD: 30s.
Michelangelo.setEffect3p: When exiting, heals self for 2.0% max HP per second for 10s. Unleash a Judgement Attack to all enemies on the battlefield, dealing 300% ATK of Physical DMG, and an additional 300% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies with less than 10% HP. CD: 30s.Lang

Misato.name: Misato
Misato.slotT_effect: Host deals 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) bonus Physical DMG and her QTE deals 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) bonus Physical DMG.Lang

Miyohime: Performance.name: Miyohime: Performance
Miyohime: Performance.slotM_effect: Move Speed increases by 5.0% (10.0% at 4*). Attacks restore 25.0 (50.0 at 4*) HP and remove the Move Speed boost on hit. CD: 8.0s.Miyohime: Performance is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''. The stigma could be found translated in the [[Version 5.7]] beta for global servers.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Monet.name: Monet
Monet.slotT_effect: Attacks against enemies gain 15% (30% at 5*) Lightning DMG. For every Combo Hit Count, host gains 0.5% (1.0% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 15 times.
Monet.slotM_effect: Gain 10% (20% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction against hits taken. For every Combo Hit Count, host gains 1.0% (2.0% at 5*) Lighting DMG. Stacks up to 15 times.
Monet.slotB_effect: For every 10s, combo/charged attacks that hit the enemy inflicts 30% (60% at 5*) Move Slow for 6s. When Combo Hit Count exceeds 30, gain 9.0% (15.0% at 5*) Attack Speed.
Monet.setEffect2p: Receive a Lightning Shield. When the shield is active, the host's attacks gain 30% Lightning DMG. When hit by enemies, the shield will negate direct Physical DMG from the enemy and disappear after 0.3s. Shield reappears after 15s.
Monet.setEffect3p: After triggering the Move Slow debuff of stigma (B) of this set, enemies within a 3.0-meter radius of the target suffer 30% Move Slow for 10s. Host also heals for 8% HP.Lang

Murata Himeko (Stigmata).name: Murata Himeko (Stigmata)
Murata Himeko (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Boosts Total DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Boosts Fire DMG by 25.0% (50.0% at 5*) in Herrscher Form.
Murata Himeko (Stigmata).slotM_effect: Boosts Max HP by 15.0% (25.0% at 5*). When the host loses HP, enemies take 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Fire DMG from the host for 8.0s (independent effect; triggering it again resets the duration).
Murata Himeko (Stigmata).slotB_effect: Boosts Total DMG by 5.0% (10.0% at 5*). The host gains 1 stack of buff that boosts her Fire DMG by 5.0% (10.0% at 5*) (max 4 stacks) for every 10% HP she loses.
Murata Himeko (Stigmata).setEffect2p: In Herrscher form, a stack granted by the B-pc of this set provides another 15.0% bonus Fire DMG. The host takes 45.0% less Indirect DMG at below 60% HP.
Murata Himeko (Stigmata).setEffect3p: Boosts Total DMG by 20.0%. When the host loses HP, her next attack will deal 100% ATK of Fire DMG to surrounding enemies, which on hit boosts her Total DMG by 10.0% for 10s (CD: 2s; triggering it again resets the duration).Lang

Nagamitsu (Stigmata).name: Nagamitsu (Stigmata)
Nagamitsu (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Generates a force field around self. Enemies staying in the force field for more than 3s receive 70% (125% at 5*) ATK of Lightning DMG per second. Effect is removed 2s after said enemy leaves the field.
Nagamitsu (Stigmata).slotM_effect: Generates a force field. Enemies staying in the force field for more than 3s receive 15% (30% at 5*) more Lightning DMG. Effect is removed 2s after said enemy leaves the field.
Nagamitsu (Stigmata).slotB_effect: Generates a force field. Enemies staying in the force field for more than 3s suffer 15% (30% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction. This effect is removed 2s after an enemy leaves the field.
Nagamitsu (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Enemies that stay in the field for more than 5s suffer 20% Move Slow and Attack Slow for 4s (duration resets when the slow effect ends). The duration resets if an enemy leaves the force field for 2s.
Nagamitsu (Stigmata).setEffect3p: Enemies that stay in the field for more than 5s will be frozen for 2s (duration resets when the freezing period ends). The duration resets if an enemy leaves the force field for 2s.Lang

New Year.name: New Year
New Year.slotT_effect: Attacks spawn a Fireworks Launcher in front of the host. Launcher fires 1 Firework every second for 4s (6s at 5*) that explodes to deal 80% (150% at 5*) ATK of Fire DMG to nearby enemies. Fireworks Launcher trigger CD: 12s.
New Year.slotM_effect: (Requires the stigma (T)) Fireworks explosion generates a shower of Red Envelopes. Allies in the AOE heal for 1% (2% at 5*) HP, and attacks for the 4s (8s at 5*) deal an additional 50 (100 at 5*) Fire DMG. This effect cannot stack.
New Year.slotB_effect: (Requires the stigma (T)) Fireworks explosions empower allies in the AOE, with attacks gaining 10% (20% at 5*) Physical DMG and Fire DMG for 3s (6s at 5*). This effect cannot stack.
New Year.setEffect2p: Fireworks explosions ignite enemies, dealing 100 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 5s. Attacks against ignited enemies gain 15% Fire DMG. This effect cannot stack.
New Year.setEffect3p: Fireworks Launcher deals an additional 20% Fire DMG. Launcher also unleashes a powerful explosion when it disappears, dealing 300% ATK of Fire DMG to enemies in a large AOE and stunning them for 4s.Lang

Nobel.name: Nobel
Nobel.slotT_effect: Gain 13% (25% at 5*) Physical DMG. For every Combo Hit Count, Charged ATKs gain 0.4% (1.0% at 5*) Physical DMG. Max stacks: 20.
Nobel.slotM_effect: Charged ATKs gain 4.0% (10.0% at 5*) Crit Rate. Enemies hit by the Charged ATK also deal 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) less Physical DMG for 1s. Triggering this again resets the time.
Nobel.slotB_effect: When Combo/Charged ATK hits the enemy, enter Absorbed State. Absorbed State: enemies hit by Combo/Charged ATKs are weakened for 3s (ATK is reduced by 15.0% [30.0% at 5*]). Absorbed State ends and enters a 24s (15s at 5*) CD when host fails to hit an enemy using Combo/Charged ATK within 4s.
Nobel.setEffect2p: When Charged ATKs hit the enemy, generate an explosion centered on host that deals 180.0% of Physical DMG to nearby enemies. CD: 1s.
Nobel.setEffect3p: After each entry, the first 2 hits taken by the host will suffer 40.0% Total DMG Reduction and not interrupt her. Crit DMG of Charges ATKs increases by 30.0%. Explosion DMG of Dynamite increases to 200.0% ATK of Physical DMG.Lang

Nohime.name: Nohime
Nohime.slotT_effect: Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) have a 10% (15% at 5*) chance to freeze enemies for 4.0s. CD: 8s. Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) against frozen enemies gain 20% (40% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Nohime.slotM_effect: Attacks gain 50% (80% at 5*) ATK of Ice DMG. CD: 1s.
Nohime.slotB_effect: For every Move Slowed or Frozen enemy on the battlefield, host gains 5% (10% at 5*) Move Speed and 15% (25% at 5*) Ice DMG. Stacks up to 3 times.
Nohime.setEffect2p: Nearby enemies suffer 60% ATK of Ice DMG per second. 30% chance of inflict Move Slow on the enemy for 4s.
Nohime.setEffect3p: Gain 20% Max HP and 80% Ice DMG in battle.Lang

Nuwa (Stigmata).name: Nuwa (Stigmata)
Nuwa (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Attacking ignited enemies generates explosions, dealing 48% (82% at 5*) ATK of Fire DMG to nearby enemies. CD: 1.5s. Attacks against ignited enemies gain 12% (20% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Nuwa (Stigmata).slotM_effect: For every Combo Hit Count, gain 1% Fire DMG. Stacks up to 60 (102 at 5*) times.
Nuwa (Stigmata).slotB_effect: Ignited debuff deals 61% (103% at 5*) more Fire DMG. Extends duration by 61% (103% at 5*).
Nuwa (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Units summoned by the host gain 60% Total DMG Multiplier.
Nuwa (Stigmata).setEffect3p: For every summoned unit (including supporting friends), gain 20% Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 5 times.Lang

Nuwa Figurine Master.name: Nuwa Figurine Master
Nuwa Figurine Master.slotT_effect: Upon breaking the enemy's shield, stun the enemy for 2s (5s at 5*) and gain 10% (20% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier to the stunned enemy.
Nuwa Figurine Master.slotM_effect: Combo ATKs gain 15% (30% at 5*) Physical DMG. After unleashing 3 Combo ATKs (CD: 1.5s), the host gains a shield for 2s (5s at 5*) that grants 10% (15% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction. Shield trigger CD: 6s.
Nuwa Figurine Master.slotB_effect: After casting Ultimate, the host gains 6% (12% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier for 8s (15s at 5*). Effect stacks up to 4 times. Re-triggering the effect resets the duration. Trigger CD: 3s.
Nuwa Figurine Master.setEffect2p: After casting Ultimates 2 times, generate a Doll Aura with a 5-meter radius. Enemies in the AOE are immobilized and take 20% more Physical DMG. The Aura lasts 6s. CD: 18s. This effect cannot stack.
Nuwa Figurine Master.setEffect3p: Shortens duration of debuffs on the host by 30%. Attacks against debuffed enemies also gain 30% Total DMG Multiplier.Lang

Octavia.name: Octavia
Octavia.slotT_effect: Combo attacks gain 5% (7% at 3*) Physical DMG.
Octavia.slotM_effect: Combo attacks gain 5% (7% at 3*) Physical DMG.
Octavia.slotB_effect: Combo attacks gain 5% (7% at 3*) Physical DMG.
Octavia.setEffect2p: Gain 23% Crit DMG.[[Mei]] or [[Yae Sakura]] equip bonus: 5% Max HP in battle.

Ogier.name: Ogier
Ogier.slotT_effect: After exit, team gains 3% (7%  at 4*) Fire, Lightning, or Ice DMG. Effect cannot stack. After entry, Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gain 10% (20% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Ogier.slotM_effect: After exit, team mates take 5% (10% at 4*) less direct Physical DMG. Effect does not stack. After entry, host takes 15% (25% at 4*) less Physical DMG from enemy attacks.
Ogier.slotB_effect: After exit, team mates gain 3% (5% at 4*) Physical DMG. Effect does not stack. After entry, host gains 15% (25% at 4*) faster Move Speed.
Ogier.setEffect2p: When there are 2 or less enemies on the field, team mates take 10.0% less Indirect DMG. This effect cannot stack.
Ogier.setEffect3p: After exit, the team mates switching in gains 20% DEF for 10s.Lang

Olenyevas: Plum Rain.name: Olenyevas: Plum Rain
Olenyevas: Plum Rain.slotB_effect: Deals 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) more Ice DMG and takes 6.0% (15.0% at 4*) less Ranged Physical DMG.Lang

Otto - Women's Attire.name: Otto - Women's Attire
Otto - Women's Attire.slotB_effect: Increases Movement Speed by 4% (10% at 5*). When equipped on [[Theresa]], increases Attack Speed by 4% (10% at 5*) and SP gaining speed by 10%.Lang

Otto Apocalypse (Stigmata).name: Otto Apocalypse (Stigmata)
Otto Apocalypse (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Basic ATKs (excluding Charged and Combo ATKs) deal 20% (35% at 5*) more Physical DMG. Every Basic ATK grants 1 stack of Charge (CD: 0.8s). After gaining 3 Charge stacks, the next charged attack gains 45% (75% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Otto Apocalypse (Stigmata).slotM_effect: An enemy hit by Basic ATKs (excluding Charged and Combo ATKs) is weakened for 2s (4s at 5*) and loses 20% (30% at 5*) ATK. CD: 2s. This effect cannot stack.
Otto Apocalypse (Stigmata).slotB_effect: For every entity summoned by the host on the battlefield, host gains 35% (55% at 5*) Lightning DMG.
Otto Apocalypse (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Each of the host's Basic ATK hits grants 1 Charge stack (CD: 0.8s). After gaining 3 Charge stacks, the next charged attack hitting an enemy generates a Punishment Field (summoned entity) with a 3-meter radius that lasts 4.0s. Enemies inside the field become conductive and take 40% more Lightning DMG. This effect cannot stack.
Otto Apocalypse (Stigmata).setEffect3p: Charges once every 5s. The next charged attack adds a Sky Brand to the target. The Sky Brand explodes after a 0.5s delay, dealing 80% ATK of Lightning DMG to nearby enemies.Lang

Outworld Traveler.name: Outworld Traveler
Outworld Traveler.slotT_effect: Attacking frozen/paralyzed/ignited enemies deals 50% (100.0% at 4*) ATK of Ice/Lightning/Fire DMG within the 3.5m radius around the target. CD: 3s.Lang

Paganini.name: Paganini
Paganini.slotT_effect: Crit Rate increases by 10.0% (15.0% at 5*). For every 5s, the next Charged ATK deals 30.0% (40.0% at 5*) bonus Physical DMG and restores 5 SP.
Paganini.slotM_effect: Dealing DMG boosts team Physical DMG by 10.0% (15.0% at 5*) and team's DMG dealt to shields by 25.0% (50.0% at 5*) for 20s. Can be refreshed. Unique effect. Effect cannot be stacked.
Paganini.slotB_effect: Charged ATK or Ultimate dealing DMG boosts team Total DMG by 14.0% (18.0% at 5*) for 20s. Can be refreshed. Unique effect.
Paganini.setEffect2p: Team deals 20.0% bonus DMG to shields. Charged ATK dealing DMG makes enemies take 20.0% bonus Physical DMG for 20s. Can be refreshed. Unique effect.
Paganini.setEffect3p: Charged ATK dealing DMG boosts Total DMG for 15s. The boost is equal to 18.0% of host's bonus DMG-dealt-to-shields ratio. CD: 15s.Lang

Picasso.name: Picasso
Picasso.slotT_effect: Every Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) grants 1 Charge stack (CD: 1s). Upon gaining 4 Charge stacks, enter Zeal Mode to deal 15% (32% at 5*) more Physical DMG. Zeal Mode lasts 3s (6s at 5*). Duration resets to every time Zeal is triggered.Paint Jar: A small jar of paint for adding color to things.
Picasso.slotM_effect: Every Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) grants 1 Charge stack (CD: 1s). Upon gaining 4 Charge stacks, enter Shelter Mode, taking 10% (25% at 5*) less Physical DMG from enemy attacks and 20% (40% at 5*) less Indirect Physical DMG. Shelter Mode lasts 3s (6s at 5*). Duration resets every time Shelter Mode is triggered.Paint Jar: A small jar of paint for adding color to things.
Picasso.slotB_effect: Every Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) grants 1 Charge stack (CD: 1s). Upon gaining 4 Charge stacks, enter Impulse Mode to gain 10% (20% at 5*) Attack Speed. Impulse Mode lasts 3s (6s at 5*). Duration resets every time Impulse Mode is triggered.Paint Jar: A small jar of paint for adding color to things.
Picasso.setEffect2p: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combo ATKs) smear enemies with an available paint every 1 second (smear lasts 10s). Paints switch every 3s. Two different paints can be blended to form a Mixed Color to trigger special effects. Mixed Color lasts 4s, during which time no other paint can be applied.Red + Yellow = Orange: Target takes 25% more Physical DMG.Red + Blue = Purple: deals 120% ATK of AOE Physical DMG.Yellow + Blue = Green: instantly heals the host for 4% HP.
Picasso.setEffect3p: A small jar of paint for adding color to things.Lang

Planck.name: Planck
Planck.slotT_effect: Deals more DMG at lower HP: gain 3.6% (6.2% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier for every 10.0% HP lost.
Planck.slotM_effect: The host's Basic ATKs (including Charged ATKs and Combo ATKs) deal 34% (51% at 5*) more Physical DMG; but the host takes 46% (72% at 5*) more Physical DMG when hit.
Planck.slotB_effect: Suffer 32% (41% at 5*) Move Slow but gain 22% (31% at 5*) faster Attack Speed.
Planck.setEffect2p: When attacked and when DMG taken is less than the product of 15 x Valkyrie's level, the host will not be interrupted (but takes DMG as usual). When equipped on [[Bronya]], ranged attacks gain 15% Total DMG Multiplier.
Planck.setEffect3p: The host heals 5% HP when hitting an enemy. CD: 5.0s. [[Bronya]] equip bonus: SP regen rate increases by 30%.Lang

Project Bunny - Mid-Autumn.name: Project Bunny - Mid-Autumn
Project Bunny - Mid-Autumn.slotT_effect: Summoned entities gain 5% (10% at 4*) Physical DMG. Host gains 10% (15% 4*) Total DMG Reduction.==Sources==*[[Autumn Moon]]Project Bunny - Mid-Autumn is a [[stigmata]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Ragna.name: Ragna
Ragna.slotT_effect: Total DMG increases by 15.0% (25.0% at 5*). Combo and Charged ATK boost host's Fire DMG by 20.0% (40.0% at 5*) for 10s. Triggering it again resets the duration.
Ragna.slotM_effect: Landing Charged ATK 10 times makes all enemies take 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Fire DMG from host and reduces their DMG dealt to host by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) for 10s. Triggering it again resets the duration.
Ragna.slotB_effect: Total DMG increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). On hit, Charged ATK boosts host's Fire DMG by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) and restores 30 HP per second for 1s. Triggering it again resets the duration.
Ragna.setEffect2p: On hit, Charged ATK boosts Move Speed by 40.0% and Fire DMG by 30.0% for 10s. Triggering it again resets the duration. [[Rita]] equip bonus: 20.0% bonus Total DMG.
Ragna.setEffect3p: Charged ATK deals 30.0% bonus Total DMG. [[Rita]] equip bonus: Charged ATK deals 50.0% bonus Fire DMG.Lang

Rasputin.name: Rasputin
Rasputin.slotT_effect: Gain 5% (12% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. ATKs on frozen or move slowed enemies gain another 5% (12% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Rasputin.slotM_effect: At 10+/30+ Combo Hits, the host deals 10%/20% (20%/35% at 5*) more Ice DMG respectively.
Rasputin.slotB_effect: Gains 15% (25% at 5*) Ice DMG. After entry, gain another 5% (15% at 5*) Ice DMG for 10s. CD: 20s.
Rasputin.setEffect2p: Basic ATK (including Combo and Charged) has a 15% chance to deal 450% Ice DMG against the target and freeze the target for 3.5s. CD: 8s.
Rasputin.setEffect3p: During combat, gain 20% Max HP and 20% Indirect DMG Reduction.Lang

Raven's Moon.name: Raven's Moon
Raven's Moon.slotB_effect: Crit DMG increased by 20.0% (40.0% at 5*). The host restores 10 (30 at 5*) HP after using weapon skills.Lang

Raven: Sea Waves.name: Raven: Sea Waves
Raven: Sea Waves.slotM_effect: Attacks against enemies outside a 3m radius deal 7.0% (15.0% at 4*) bonus Total DMG.Lang

Rinaldo.name: Rinaldo
Rinaldo.slotT_effect: Upon scoring a crit strike, deal an additional 80.0% (150.0% at 4*) ATK of Physical DMG to target and nearby enemies within a 2-meter radius. CD: 5.0s.
Rinaldo.slotM_effect: Upon scoring a crit strike, paralyze target and surrounding enemies within a 2.5-meter radius for 1.5s. CD: 8.0s (5.0s at 4*).
Rinaldo.slotB_effect: Upon scoring a crit strike, heals self for 60 (120 at 4*) HP. CD: 8.0s.
Rinaldo.setEffect3p: Upon enemy kill, gain 50% Crit DMG for 6s. Duration is reset every time this effect is triggered.Lang

Rita - Songkran.name: Rita - Songkran
Rita - Songkran.slotT_effect: When the host unleashes the weapon skill, generates a water balloon (summoned entity) on the spot that expoldes after a delay to deal 150% (300% at 5*) ATK of Ice DMG (DMG calculations are based on the host's stats) and freeze the target for 1.0s (2.0s at 5*); CD: 12.0s.Rita - Songkran is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.==Sources=====Time-limited===2020:*[[Splendid Spring Login Bonus]] - log in for 3 days to obtain the stigma.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Rita Rosemary.name: Rita Rosemary
Rita Rosemary.slotT_effect: Boost Lightning DMG by 5% (10.0% at 4*) and melee Lightning DMG against paralyzed enemies by 5% (10.0% at 4*).Lang

Rita's Angst.name: Rita's Angst
Rita's Angst.slotT_effect: Charged ATKs gain 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) Lightning / Ice / Fire DMG. [[Rita]] equip bonus: Charged ATKs gain 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier.Lang

Rita: Autumn Leaves.name: Rita: Autumn Leaves
Rita: Autumn Leaves.slotB_effect: Attacks against enemies below 50% HP gain 10% (20% at 4*) Physical DMG.Lang

Rita: Cleaning.name: Rita: Cleaning
Rita: Cleaning.slotM_effect: For every enemy defeated, recover ? (50.0 at 4*) HP as well as gain ? (20.0% at 4*) Total DMG Reduction for 3s. Triggering it again refreshes the duration.Rita: Cleaning is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Rita: Dame de CÅ“ur.name: Rita: Dame de CÅ“ur
Rita: Dame de CÅ“ur.slotT_effect: Charged ATK gains 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) Physical DMG. [[Rita]] equip bonus: Charged ATK gains 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier.Lang

Rita: Dr. Dew.name: Rita: Dr. Dew
Rita: Dr. Dew.slotM_effect: Ice DMG increases by 5.0% (10.0% at 4*). On hit, Charged ATKs boost host's Move Speed by 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) for 5s. Triggering it again resets the duration.Lang

Rita: Sweetheart.name: Rita: Sweetheart
Rita: Sweetheart.slotM_effect: Host deals 7.0% (15.0% at 4*) bonus Physical DMG at 50% HP or above and restores 214 HP when HP drops below 50%. HP regen CD: 20s.Lang

Rita: Thimbleberry.name: Rita: Thimbleberry
Rita: Thimbleberry.slotM_effect: When facing only 1 enemy, gain 15.0% (30.0% at 5*) Crit DMG, otherwise gain 6.0% (15.0% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier.Lang

Roald Amundsen.name: Roald Amundsen
Roald Amundsen.slotT_effect: Charged ATK gains 10% (20% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier.
Roald Amundsen.slotM_effect: Deals 10% (20% at 4*) more Ice DMG and takes 10% (20% at 4*) less Ice DMG.
Roald Amundsen.slotB_effect: When attacks hit Frozen, Move Slowed, or Attack Slowed enemies, heal self for 100 (200 at 4*) HP. CD: 10s.
Roald Amundsen.setEffect2p: After using the weapon's active skill, team takes 15% less Physical DMG for 8s. CD: 20s. Effect cannot stack.
Roald Amundsen.setEffect3p: Team gains 10% Fire, Lightning, and Ice DMG. Effect cannot stack.Lang

Robert Peary.name: Robert Peary
Robert Peary.slotT_effect: The host gains 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. When Combo Hit Count exceeds 20, gain 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) Ice DMG.
Robert Peary.slotM_effect: For every Combo Hit Count, the host gains 0.10% (0.40% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier and 0.20% (0.50% at 5*) Ice DMG. Stacks up to 60 times.
Robert Peary.slotB_effect: Hits against Frozen or Ice Cell enemies heal the host for 150.0 (300.0 at 5*) HP. CD: 12.0s (9.0s at 5*).
Robert Peary.setEffect2p: When attacked, said attack suffers 25% Total DMG Reduction. The attacker is also frozen for 5.0s. Said effect works only 1 time for each enemy. After entry, the host's first attack directly adds 20 to the Combo Hit counter. CD: 15s.
Robert Peary.setEffect3p: The host gains 20% faster ATK Speed and 25% Total DMG Multiplier, and receives an Energy Charge for 15s that ignores combo interruption 1 time (Max stacks: 2).Lang

Rowland.name: Rowland
Rowland.slotM_effect: 36% (51% at 4*) chance to directly ignore a debuff.
Rowland.slotB_effect: Gain 19% (31% at 4*) DEF at 80% or higher HP.
Rowland.setEffect2p: Attacks by PSY-type enemies suffer 20% DMG Reduction. [[Kiana]] or [[Kallen]] equip bonus: Gain 20% Max HP in battle.
Rowland.setEffect3p: When attacking PSY-type enemies, gain 20% Physical DMG. [[Kiana]] or [[Kallen]] equip bonus: Gain 10% Crit Rate in battle.Lang

Sakamoto Ryoma.name: Sakamoto Ryoma
Sakamoto Ryoma.slotT_effect: Charged ATKs gain 11% (18% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Sakamoto Ryoma.slotM_effect: Switch skill (and QTE) gain 22% (41% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Sakamoto Ryoma.slotB_effect: Combo ATKs gain 15% (26% at 4*) Physical DMG.
Sakamoto Ryoma.setEffect2p: Gain 10% Total DMG Multiplier against enemy with unbroken Elite Shield.

Sanada Yukimura.name: Sanada Yukimura
Sanada Yukimura.slotT_effect: When entering battle, Basic ATKs (including Combo and Charged ATKs) gain 20% (35% at 5*) Physical DMG for 15.0s. CD: 35.0s (30.0s at 5*).
Sanada Yukimura.slotM_effect: When entering battle, gain 10% (25% at 5*) Crit Rate for 15.0s. CD: 35.0s (30.0s at 5*).
Sanada Yukimura.slotB_effect: When entering battle, gain 150% (300% at 5*) DEF for 15.0s. CD: 35.0s (30.0s at 5*).
Sanada Yukimura.setEffect2p: When a single hit taken deals more than 20% HP in DMG, ignore the DMG dealt by said hit. CD: 25s.
Sanada Yukimura.setEffect3p: Buffs provided by each stigmata of the stigmata set gain a 15% bonus. [[Mei]] or [[Yae Sakura]] equip bonus: Gain 20% Max HP in battle.Lang

Schrodinger.name: Schrodinger
Schrodinger.slotT_effect: Charges once every 6.0s. The next Basic ATK (including Combo and Charged ATKs) has a 50% chance of gaining 121% (205% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier (otherwise, by 26% [52% at 5*]) for a short duration.
Schrodinger.slotM_effect: After using an Ultimate or triggering an Evasion skill, gain a 50% chance of reducing CD by 34% (51% at 5*). Otherwise, CD is increased by 20%.
Schrodinger.slotB_effect: Charges once every 4.0s. The next Basic ATK (including Combo and Charged ATKs) has a 50% chance of increasing SP by an additional 182% (308% at 5*). Otherwise, SP gain is decreased by 100%.
Schrodinger.setEffect2p: When attacked, there is a 50% chance that said attack suffers 70% Total DMG Reduction. Otherwise, said attack gains 40% Total DMG Multiplier.
Schrodinger.setEffect3p: All stigmata buffs from this stigmata set gain a 10% trigger chance. [[Himeko]] equip bonus: Gain another 10% trigger chance.Lang

Schrodinger Band.name: Schrodinger Band
Schrodinger Band.slotT_effect: For each attack that hits an enemy (CD: 0.3s), gain 1% (2% at 5*) Physical DMG. Enter the Elated Mode for 5s when gaining 7 stacks. In this Mode, attacks gain 10% (25% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier (attacks in Elated Mode no longer grant stacks). All buffs will be removed after Elated Mode ends.
Schrodinger Band.slotM_effect: For each attack that hits an enemy (CD: 0.3s), gain 1% (2% at 5*) Crit Rate. Enter the Elated Mode for 5s when gaining 7 stacks. In this Mode, gain immunity to control buffs and 5% (15% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction (attacks in Elated Mode no longer grants stacks). All buffs will be removed after Elated Mode ends.
Schrodinger Band.slotB_effect: For each attack that hits an enemy (CD: 0.3s), gain 1% (2% at 5*) Attack Speed. Enter the Elated Mode for 5s when gaining 7 stacks. In this Mode, each attack that hits the enemy (CD: 0.9s) gains 0.5 (2.0 at 5*) SP (attacks in Elated Mode no longer grant stacks). All buffs will be removed after Elated Mode ends.
Schrodinger Band.setEffect2p: Extends the duration of Elated Mode provided by this stigmata set by another 2s. Each attack buffs the effects by another 1%. After entering Elated Mode, gain 50% Physical DMG for the next Combo ATK and a short duration afterwards.
Schrodinger Band.setEffect3p: Attacks against Frozen enemies gain 20% Physical DMG. [[Kiana]] or [[Kallen]] equip bonus: Combo ATKs gain 20% Total DMG Multiplier.Lang

Schrodinger: Tour.name: Schrodinger: Tour
Schrodinger: Tour.slotT_effect: After performing Ultimate, gain 10.0% (20.0% at 4*) Physical DMG for 6s. Does not trigger again during this time.
Schrodinger: Tour.slotM_effect: After Ultimate Evasion, gain 10.0% (20.0% at 4*) Crit DMG for 6s. Does not trigger again during this time.
Schrodinger: Tour.slotB_effect: After entry, gain 10.0% (20.0% at 4*) Total DMG Reduction for 6s. Does not trigger again during this time.
Schrodinger: Tour.setEffect2p: Gain 10.0% Crit Rate. QUA equip bonus: Gain 15.0% faster ATK Speed.

Scott.name: Scott
Scott.slotT_effect: Gain 6% (12% at 4*) Ice DMG. For each Combo Hit, the host gains 0.5% Total DMG Multiplier. Max stacks: 20.
Scott.slotM_effect: Gain 8% (15% at 4*) Ice DMG. Charged or Combo ATKs gain another 10% (20% at 4*) Ice DMG.
Scott.slotB_effect: Gain 10% (20% at 4*) Max HP in battle. ATKs against frozen enemies have a 10% (20% at 4*) chance to heal the host for 100 (200 at 4*) HP. CD: 10s.
Scott.setEffect3p: After using Combo or Charged ATK, host gains 18% Ice DMG for 6s.Lang

Seele - Cyan Sea.name: Seele - Cyan Sea
Seele - Cyan Sea.slotM_effect: Increases Movement Speed by ? (10% at 4*) when there are no more than 4 enemies on the battlefield. Increases maximum SP during battle by an additional ? (10% at 4*) when equipped on [[Bronya]].Seele - Cyan Sea is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Seele Vollerei (Stigmata).name: Seele Vollerei (Stigmata)
Seele Vollerei (Stigmata).slotT_effect: When Max SP is 150 or higher in battle, gain 3% (6% at 5*) Physical DMG for every 20 additional SP. Stacks up to 6 times.
Seele Vollerei (Stigmata).slotM_effect: When Max SP is 150 or higher in battle, take 2% (5% at 5*) less Physical DMG from enemy attacks for every 20 additional SP. Stacks up to 6 times.
Seele Vollerei (Stigmata).slotB_effect: When Max SP is 150 or higher in battle, gain 1% (4% at 5*) Attack Speed for every 20 additional SP. Stacks up to 6 times.
Seele Vollerei (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Gain 30% Move Speed. Teleports to a random nearby area when hit by an enemy. CD: 10.0s.
Seele Vollerei (Stigmata).setEffect3p: For a 3s period after using Ultimate or weapon skill with Direct DMG abilities, empower Skill DMG based on remaining SP percentage, gaining 15% Total DMG Multiplier for every remaining 20% of SP.Lang

Seele: Birthday.name: Seele: Birthday
Seele: Birthday.slotT_effect: Gain 5% (10% at 4*) Melee Physical DMG. If [[Bronya]] and [[Seele]] are both on the team, gain another 5% (10% at 4*) Melee Physical DMG.Lang

Seele: Doubled Bliss.name: Seele: Doubled Bliss
Seele: Doubled Bliss.slotT_effect: After unleashing Ultimate, enters the Spring Revelry mode, under which the host deals 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) more Physical DMG for 12s; CD: 16s.Lang

Seele: Shopping.name: Seele: Shopping
Seele: Shopping.slotM_effect: Once attacked, the host's next hit gains 15% (25% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier. CD: 1s.Lang

Seele: Spring Trip.name: Seele: Spring Trip
Seele: Spring Trip.slotM_effect: Physical DMG increases by 4.0% (8.0% at 4*). Ultimate restores 50 (100 at 4*) HP and boosts Crit Rate by 4.0% (8.0% at 4*) for 10s. Triggering it again resets the duration.Lang

Seele: The Deep.name: Seele: The Deep
Seele: The Deep.slotM_effect: After switch entry, nearby enemies suffer 10% (20% at 4*) Move Slow for 5.0s. CD: 20.0s.Lang

Shakespeare.name: Shakespeare
Shakespeare.setEffect2p: Shortens CDs of effects triggered by Ultimate Evasions (or Perfect DEF) by 35%. PSY-type battlesuit equip bonus: Gain 15% Max SP in battle.
Shakespeare.setEffect3p: Reduce active skill SP cost by 20%.Lang

Shakespeare: Adrift.name: Shakespeare: Adrift
Shakespeare: Adrift.slotT_effect: Boosts Fire DMG by 16.0% (25.0% at 5*). Raising or refreshing Alignment deals 90.0% (150.0% at 5*) ATK of Fire DMG and ignites enemies dealing further 18.0% (30.0% at 5*) ATK of Fire DMG per 0.5s for 6s.
Shakespeare: Adrift.slotM_effect: Boosts Total DMG by 11.0% (20.0% at 5*). Raising Alignment by 1 boosts Ultimate's Fire DMG by 5.0% (8.0% at 5*).
Shakespeare: Adrift.slotB_effect: Boosts Fire DMG by 16.0% (25.0% at 5*). Raising or refreshing Alignment restores 2.0 (3.0 at 5*) SP.
Shakespeare: Adrift.setEffect2p: Boosts Fire DMG by 20.0%. Landing an Ultimate within 4s after its cast raises Alignment by 1 (4 levels in total: Jove/Venus/Luna/Sol). Alignment drops by 1 every 10s and can be refreshed at level 4. Alignment 4 (Sol) makes enemies take 20.0% bonus Fire DMG from host (independent effect).
Shakespeare: Adrift.setEffect3p: Boosts Ultimate's Total DMG by 30.0%. Raising or refreshing Alignment restores 30.0 HP. [[Durandal]] equip bonus: Ultimates deal 15.0% bonus Total DMG. Landing a Throw or QTE raises Alignment by 1.Lang

Shattered Swords.name: Shattered Swords
Shattered Swords.slotT_effect: Boosts Physical DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Ultimate Evasion boosts Physical DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) for 15s. Can be refreshed.
Shattered Swords.slotM_effect: Boosts Physical DMG by 15.0% (30.0% at 5*). Host takes 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) less Total DMG in burst mode.
Shattered Swords.slotB_effect: Combo ATK boosts team Crit DMG by 15.0% (25.0% at 5*) for 15s (cannot stack).
Shattered Swords.setEffect2p: In Herrscher form, team deals 30.0% bonus Crit DMG (cannot stack) and host's attacks mark enemies. The mark explodes at 15 stacks dealing 300.0% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies nearby and removing marks on all enemies. CD: 5s.
Shattered Swords.setEffect3p: Team gains 10.0% Crit Rate for 12s upon entry. When the host is in Herrscher form and hits an enemy, team gains 3.5% Total DMG for 12s (CD: 0.4s; 10 stacks max; if equipped by more than 1 Valkyrie, only one piece will take effect). Triggering it again resets the duration.Lang

Shennong.name: Shennong
Shennong.slotT_effect: When picking up a SP bag, gain 44% (61% at 5*) Physical DMG 44% (61% at 5*) DEF for 10s. CD: 15s.
Shennong.slotM_effect: When picking up dropped gold, gain 34% (51% at 5*) Attack Speed and 34% (51% at 5*) Move Speed for 7s. CD: 10s.
Shennong.slotB_effect: When attacked and injured by the enemy, receive a protective shield that can absorb any DMG equal to 18% (31% at 5*) of the host's max HP. Duration: 5s. CD: 12s.
Shennong.setEffect2p: When attacked by weakened enemies, there is a 40% chance that the Valkyrie takes zero DMG (does not protect against Elemental DMG). CD: 3s.
Shennong.setEffect3p: Increases HP and SP bag recovery by 50%.Lang

Shigure Kira (Stigmata).name: Shigure Kira (Stigmata)
Shigure Kira (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Elemental damage of fire, lightning, and ice are all increased by 8% (15% at 4*).
Shigure Kira (Stigmata).slotM_effect: Gain 8% (15% at 4*) Max HP and 8% (15% at 4*) DEF in battle.
Shigure Kira (Stigmata).slotB_effect: After a successful Ultimate Evasion, Fire, Lightning, and Ice DMG are each increased by 8% (20% at 4*) for 5s. Triggering the ability again will reset the duration.

Shuijing.name: Shuijing
Shuijing.slotT_effect: Team deals 4.0% (8.0% at 5*) bonus Physical DMG (cannot stack). QTE boosts team Physical DMG by 4.0% (8.0% at 5*) on hit for 8s (cannot stack but can be refreshed). While Recommendation is active, duration is extended by 4s.
Shuijing.slotM_effect: Grants 10.0% (30.0% at 5*) bonus Physical DMG. QTE deals 20.0% (50.0% at 5*) bonus DMG against shields.
Shuijing.slotB_effect: Enemies hit by QTE enter Censured State (cannot stack but can be refreshed), where they deal 6.0% (12.0% at 5*) reduced total DMG and take 9.0% (18.0% at 5*) bonus Physical DMG for 8s.
Shuijing.setEffect2p: Boosts total DMG by 30.0%. Censured State lasts 4s longer.
Shuijing.setEffect3p: Ultimate activation boosts Total DMG dealt by the host and the teammate on field by 20.0% for 18s (effect cannot stack). When equipped by [[Starlit Astrologos]], she additionally gains 40.0% Crit DMG.Lang

Siegfried Kaslana (Stigmata).name: Siegfried Kaslana (Stigmata)
Siegfried Kaslana (Stigmata).slotT_effect: When using a weapon active skill, reduce SP cost by 10% (25% at 5*). For 6.0s after using the skill, gain 20% (35% at 5*) Attack Speed.
Siegfried Kaslana (Stigmata).slotM_effect: When using a weapon active skill, shorten CDs by 10% (40% at 5*). For 6.0s after using the skill, gain 30% (50% at 5*) DEF.
Siegfried Kaslana (Stigmata).slotB_effect: When using a weapon active skill, gain 20% (35% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier for said active skill. For 6.0s after using the skill, gain 10% (20% at 5*) Move Speed.
Siegfried Kaslana (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Within a 10s interval after using any active weapon skill, the next weapon active skill gains 20% Total DMG Multiplier. DMG boost stacks up to 5 times. Adding a stack resets the effect duration.
Siegfried Kaslana (Stigmata).setEffect3p: After using 6 weapon skills, enter Hero Mode that lasts 20s (CD: 60s), gaining 70% Physical DMG, 25% Attack Speed and Move Speed, and immunity to most debuffs.Lang

Sin Mal (Stigmata).name: Sin Mal (Stigmata)
Sin Mal (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Gain 11% (15% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. Starts charging energy after becoming invisible, gaining 11% (15% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier every second (stacks up to 3 times). Stacks will be removed 4s after ending invisibility.
Sin Mal (Stigmata).slotM_effect: Attacks received suffer 10% (20% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction. After becoming invisible, the host further gains 5% (10% at 5*) Total DMG Reduction and 30% faster Move Speed. Effects will be removed 6s after invisibility ends.
Sin Mal (Stigmata).slotB_effect: After becoming invisible, gain 10% (25% at 5*) Attack Speed and 10% (20% at 5*) Crit Rate. Effects will be removed 6s after invisibility ends.
Sin Mal (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Receives a Charge upon becoming invisible. When invisibility ends, deal 200% ATK of Physical DMG to all enemies. Enemies hit by the next Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) and during a short period afterwards will be immobilized for 3s.
Sin Mal (Stigmata).setEffect3p: When invisible, the host heals 2% HP and gains 2% SP every 0.9s.Lang

Sirin (Stigmata).name: Sirin (Stigmata)
Sirin (Stigmata).slotT_effect: Gain 15% (25% at 5*) Melee Physical DMG. Against enemies knocked airborne, deal an additional 10% (20% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Sirin (Stigmata).slotM_effect: Take 15% (30% at 5*) less All Elemental DMG and gain a 11% (20% at 5*) chance to ignore debuffs.
Sirin (Stigmata).slotB_effect: Upon an Ultimate Evasion, gain 1 Charge that grants an additional 20% (35% at 5*) Total DMG multiplier to the next attack and 5s afterwards. CD: 1.5s.
Sirin (Stigmata).setEffect2p: [[Mei]] or [[Yae Sakura]] equip bonus: Each repeated hit on the same target (resets if no attacks occur in 2.5s) boosts the next hit by 3% Crit Rate (max 15%) and 8% Crit DMG (max 40%) per hit.
Sirin (Stigmata).setEffect3p: When character is deployed and above 60% HP, enemy suffers 15% Total DMG Reduction to their attack and 10% more Total DMG Multiplier in damage taken. Effect cannot stack.Lang

Sirin: Ascendant.name: Sirin: Ascendant
Sirin: Ascendant.slotT_effect: Gains 10% (20% at 5*) Physical DMG. Under Herrscher Form, gain another 20% (30% at 5*) Physical DMG.
Sirin: Ascendant.slotM_effect: Shortens CD of Ultimate Evasions by 10% (20% at 5*) and gains 10% (30% at 5*) Crit DMG.
Sirin: Ascendant.slotB_effect: When entering battle, host obtains a Space Barrier that reduces 100 (300 at 5*) Elemental DMG from enemy hits and then enters a 6s CD. While the barrier lasts, host has 10% (20% at 5*) bonus Attack Speed and deals 10% (15% at 5*) bonus Physical DMG.
Sirin: Ascendant.setEffect2p: For every friendly summoned entity, the host gains 12% Total DMG Multiplier for 10.0s. Stacks up to 3 times. Triggering this again at max stacks resets the duration of the stack with the least remaining time.
Sirin: Ascendant.setEffect3p: Gain 50% Crit DMG. Under Herrscher Form, gain 15% Crit Rate.Lang

Starlit Swing.name: Starlit Swing
Starlit Swing.slotM_effect: When equipped by [[Theresa]], it grants 7.0% (15.0% at 4*) bonus Physical DMG and 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) bonus QTE total DMG.Lang

Summer Day.name: Summer Day
Summer Day.slotT_effect: When the host is attacking, generates a water balloon (summoned entity) on the spot that explodes after a 3s delay to deal 150% (300% at 5*) ATK of Ice DMG (DMG calculations are based on the host's stats); CD: 9.0s.
Summer Day.slotM_effect: Requires Stigma (T). When the water balloon explodes, attacks of allies within the explosion AOE gain 18% (30% at 5*) Fire, Ice, and Lightning DMG for 4.5s (6.0s at 5*). This effect cannot stack.
Summer Day.slotB_effect: Requires Stigma (T). When water balloon explodes, heals allies within the AOE for 110 (200 at 5*) HP.
Summer Day.setEffect2p: Enlarges the AOE of the water balloon explosion by 2 meters. Enemies within the explosion AOE are frozen for 1.5s.
Summer Day.setEffect3p: Exploding water balloon deals 200% more Ice DMG. Shortens CD by 2s.Lang

Summer Surf.name: Summer Surf
Summer Surf.slotM_effect: Ranged attacks gain 20% (40% at 4*) Crit DMG.
Summer Surf.slotB_effect: Take 5% (15% at 4*) less Ranged DMG and gain 10% (20% at 4*) Max HP in battle.
Summer Surf.setEffect2p: When ranged attack hits, deal 200% ATK of Physical DMG in a 3.5-meter AOE around the enemy. CD: 5s.

Tchaikovsky.name: Tchaikovsky
Tchaikovsky.slotT_effect: When an enemy scores a melee ATK hit, reduce Physical DMG of said ATK by 100 (500 at 4*) and paralyze said enemy for 2.0s (4.0s at 4*). Effect triggers once every 12.0s (10.0s at 4*).
Tchaikovsky.slotM_effect: Casting weapon skill gives the host a 4.00% (8.00% at 4*) Indirect Physical DMG reduction buff. Max stacks: 4. DMG reduction lasts the entire battle but taking a hit removes all stacks.
Tchaikovsky.slotB_effect: Switching heals self for 10.00% (20.00% at 4*) Max HP. CD: 40.0s (30.0s at 4*).
Tchaikovsky.setEffect2p: After casting the Ultimate, next team member switching in gains a 10% Total DMG Multiplier buff (does not stack) for 10s. CD: 30s.
Tchaikovsky.setEffect3p: After casting the Ultimate, next team member switching in takes 30% less Total DMG (effect does not stack) for 10s and restores HP equal to 10% of the host's Max HP. CD: 30s.Lang

Teri Teri.name: Teri Teri
Teri Teri.slotM_effect: When there is a targeted enemy, the host takes 21% (36% at 4*) less Physical DMG from attacks from all other enemies.Lang

Tesla Band.name: Tesla Band
Tesla Band.slotT_effect: After exit, team gains 5% (10% at 5*) Physical DMG (effect cannot stack). When on the field, the host gains 5% (15% at 5*) Physical DMG and 5% (20% at 5*) faster Attack Speed.
Tesla Band.slotM_effect: After exit, allies gain 5% (15% at 5*) Lightning DMG Resistance and attacks deal 5% (15% at 5*) more Lightning DMG (effect cannot stack). When on the field, the host takes 10% (25% at 5*) less Physical DMG from enemy hits.
Tesla Band.slotB_effect: After exit, team gains 5% (10% at 5*) Move Speed (effect cannot stack). When on the field, the host gains 20% (35% at 5*) Lightning DMG and 5% (10% at 5*) Move Speed.
Tesla Band.setEffect2p: Every Basic ATK (including Charged and Combo ATKs) grants 1 Accord Charge stack (CD: 1s). After gaining 4 Accord Charge stacks, reset stacks to zero and unleash Chain Lightning that attacks 4 random targets, paralyzing them for 5s and dealing 600% ATK of Lightning DMG to the first target, with each leap dealing 20% less total Lightning DMG to enemies. Chain Lightning does not hit the same target twice. CD: 15s.
Tesla Band.setEffect3p: Gain 20% Max HP and 40% Lightning DMG in battle. Lightning DMG dealt by Chain Lightning no longer decays with each leap.Lang

Thales.name: Thales
Thales.slotT_effect: Gain 10% (25% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. For every Combo Hit Count, the host gains 0.9% (1.5% at 5*) Fire DMG. Stacks up to 10 times.
Thales.slotM_effect: Gain 10% (20% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. Every hit (CD: 0.3s) on the enemy will cause it to take 1.0% (2.0% at 5*) more Fire DMG from the host for 5s. Stacks up to 10 times. Each stack gained resets the duration.
Thales.slotB_effect: Gain 5% (15% at 5*) Attack Speed. For every Combo Hit Count, the host receives 0.9% (1.5% at 5*) less Physical DMG from hits taken. Stacks up to 10 times.
Thales.setEffect2p: Gains 1 charge every 10s. For the next Charged ATK and a short duration thereafter, gain 50% Total DMG Multiplier, then enter Blazer Mode for 5s. During Blazer Mode, the host's Ultimate attacks gain 30% Total DMG Multiplier.
Thales.setEffect3p: In Blazer Mode, the host gains Ignore Interrupt, 15% Total DMG Reduction from hits taken from the enemy, and heals self for 50 HP/s.Lang

Theresa - Hot Springs.name: Theresa - Hot Springs
Theresa - Hot Springs.slotB_effect: Heal 10 (20 at 5*) HP/s. When the host is [[Theresa]] (any battlesuit), gain 0.4 (1.0 at 5*) SP/s when on the field.Theresa - Hot Springs is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.==Sources==*[[Symphony of the Stars]][[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Theresa Magic Loli.name: Theresa Magic Loli
Theresa Magic Loli.slotM_effect: Gain 10% (30% at 4*) Fire DMG.[[Theresa]] equip bonus: Cross weapons gain 10% (15% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier.Lang

Theresa's Birthday.name: Theresa's Birthday
Theresa's Birthday.slotB_effect: The host gains 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) Physical DMG and deals 5.0% (10.0% at 4*) more DMG against shields.Lang

Theresa: Descent.name: Theresa: Descent
Theresa: Descent.slotT_effect: Switch entry deals 100% (300% at 4*) ATK of Physical DMG to nearby enemies. CD: 12.0s.Theresa: Descent is a [[stigma]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Theresa: Gala.name: Theresa: Gala
Theresa: Gala.slotM_effect: Reaching 10/20/30 Combo Hits boosts Physical DMG by 4.0%/6.0%/8.0% (8.0%/12.0%/16.0% at 5*) respectively.Lang

Theresa: Gluttony.name: Theresa: Gluttony
Theresa: Gluttony.slotT_effect: Team has 0.50 (1.00 at 5*) longer pick-up range (cannot stack). Every second or every successful hit grants 1 charge (independent stacking methods). At 12 charges, the next enemy hit drops a candy (CD: 2s). 12 charges at stage entry. Unpicked candies will disappear in 8s. Picking up a candy induces Gluttony State, where the team deals 8.0% (16.0% at 5*) bonus Total DMG for 5s. Picking up another candy in Gluttony State boosts bonus Total DMG to 12.0% (24.0% at 5*) and resets the duration.Lang

Theresa: Origins.name: Theresa: Origins
Theresa: Origins.slotT_effect: Upon using a weapon active skill, gain 15% (30% at 4*) Total DMG Multiplier for 6.0s.
Theresa: Origins.slotM_effect: Upon using a weapon active skill, shorten CDs by 15% (30% at 4*).
Theresa: Origins.slotB_effect: Upon using a weapon active skill, gain 10% (25% at 4*) Attack Speed for 4.0s.
Theresa: Origins.setEffect2p: Allies take 20% less DMG from frontal attacks. When equipped on [[Theresa]], gain 20% max SP.
Theresa: Origins.setEffect3p: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combo ATKs) of allies gain 15% Physical DMG. Effect does not stack. [[Theresa]] equip bonus: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combo ATKs) further gain 15% Physical DMG.Lang

Theresa: Plum Rain.name: Theresa: Plum Rain
Theresa: Plum Rain.slotT_effect: Total DMG increases by 5.0% (10.0% at 4*). Triggering Ultimate Evasion restores 10.0 (20.0 at 4*) HP per 2 seconds for 10s.Lang

Theresa: Twilight Paladin.name: Theresa: Twilight Paladin
Theresa: Twilight Paladin.slotB_effect: Gains 8% (15% at 5*) Physical DMG. Upon scoring a Crit hit, the host gains 5% (10% at 5*) faster ATK Speed for 5s. CD: 10s.Lang

Turgenev.name: Turgenev
Turgenev.slotT_effect: The host and her summoned entities gain 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) Ice DMG. Team and the host's summoned entities gain 9.0% (18.0% at 5*) Total DMG when there are Hunter Marked enemies on the field. This effect cannot stack.
Turgenev.slotM_effect: The host's summoned entities deal 20.0% (35.0% at 5*) more Total DMG. The host's QTE deals 12.0% (25.0% at 5*) more Ice DMG against Hunter Marked enemies.
Turgenev.slotB_effect: The host's attack triggers an explosion centering on the target, which inflicts a 6-sec Hunter Mark on enemies with no Hunter Mark within the explosion AOE. Explosion CD: 8s. Team and the host's summoned entities deal 18.0% (36.0% at 5*) more All Elemental DMG against Hunter Marked enemies; this effect cannot stack.
Turgenev.setEffect2p: Every 6 hits from the host or her summoned entities prolongs the Hunter Mark effect for 2s. Hunter Mark max duration: 12s. Combo counter resets when Hunter Mark disappears. Hunter Marked enemies receive 21.0% All Elemental DMG (cannot stack).
Turgenev.setEffect3p: The host's Ultimate and her summoned entities deal 25.0% more Total DMG. When there are the host's summoned entities on the field, team deals 25.0% more Ice DMG against Hunter Marked enemies. This effect cannot stack.Lang

Valkyrie Judah.name: Valkyrie Judah
Valkyrie Judah.slotT_effect: When the host hits an enemy with Basic ATKs, summons a Theresa Doll (summoned entity) that explodes after 2.0s to deal 100% (200% at 4*) ATK of Lightning DMG (DMG calculations are based on the host's stats) against enemies within a 4-meter radius; CD: 10s (5s at 4*).Lang

Verne.name: Verne
Verne.slotT_effect: Ice DMG increases by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*). Charged ATKs deal 20.0% (40.0% at 5*) bonus Total DMG.

Wang Zhenyi.slotB_effect: Elemental DMG increases by 12.5% (25.0% at 5*). Weapon actives make enemies hit take 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) bonus Lightning DMG for 20s. Triggering it again resets the duration.

Welt Yang (Stigmata).name: Welt Yang (Stigmata)

Welt Yang (Stigmata).slotB_effect: Gain 8% (15% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. Gain a shield when freezing enemies and heal 20 (50 at 5*) HP/s for 10s. CD: 15s. Shield shatters when hit, but host will not be interrupted.
Welt Yang (Stigmata).setEffect2p: Each 15 non-Charged ATK gives a Charged ATK buff: Next Charged ATK and following Charged ATK for 5s gain 60% Total DMG Multiplier. Count ends after the buff ends. Host directly gains Charged ATK buff when entering battle (triggers 1 time per battle).
Welt Yang (Stigmata).setEffect3p: Gain 40% Ice DMG. For 16s after casting the Ultimate, Charged ATKs will generate a 3s Gravity Vortex that pulls-in nearby enemies. CD: 4s.Lang

Wendy: Envy.name: Wendy: Envy
Wendy: Envy.slotT_effect: ?Wendy: Envy is an unreleased [[stigmata]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''. Assigning it to slot (T) is due to technical limitations. It is actually unknown what slot it'd occupy as even its files don't follow the usual naming format and end with 4 instead of 1, 2 or 3, where 1 = (T) slot, 2 = (M) slot, and 3 = (B) slot.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]

Wilde.name: Wilde

Yae Sakura (Stigmata).slotB_effect: For each enemy with Sakura Brand, gain 4% (7% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 5 times. One Slash also gains 5% Crit Rate.

Yae Sakura (Stigmata).setEffect3p: Upon killing an elite, heals the host for 30% HP. CD: 10s.Lang

Zeno.name: Zeno
Zeno.slotT_effect: Increases Lightning DMG by 22.5% (45.0% at 5*). Once Combo ATK deals Lightning DMG, increases Total DMG by 10.0% (20.0% at 5*) for 10s (triggering it again refreshes the duration).

Zhangheng.setEffect2p: When there are enemies nearby, emit a seismic wave with a 3-meter radius from the host every 5s. For every 3 seismic waves, the first 2 will knock down non-boss enemies and the 3rd will stun non-boss enemies for 3s.
Zhangheng.setEffect3p: When there are 3 or more enemies on the battlefield, all allies gain 15% Physical DMG and 25% Crit DMG. This effect cannot stack.Lang

Zorro.name: Zorro
Zorro.slotT_effect: Gain 10% (20% at 5*) Total DMG Multiplier. After an Ultimate Evasion, gain 1.0 (3.0 at 5*) SP.
Zorro.slotM_effect: Gain 25% (40% at 5*) Crit DMG. After Ultimate Evasion, gain an additional 10% (15% at 5*) Crit Rate for 5s. Triggering this skill again resets the duration.
Zorro.slotB_effect: Gain 15% (20% at 5*) Physical DMG. After Ultimate Evasion, gain an additional 15% (20% at 5*) Physical DMG for 5s. Triggering this skill again resets the duration.
Zorro.setEffect2p: Gain 1 charge for every 10s on the field. When there are nearby enemies deal 100% ATK of Lightning DMG to a random nearby enemy and stun them for 0.5s. The host also enters Destreza mode. Any evasion will trigger Ultimate Evasion effects (Destreza ends upon Ultimate Evasion). Unleash a Lightning Shockwave when going on the field for the first time. After Ultimate Evasion, Combo / Charged ATKs gain 20% Total DMG Multiplier for 5s. Triggering the effect again resets the duration.
Zorro.setEffect3p: After Ultimate Evasion, the next attack unleashes a Z-slash (CD: 10s). The Z-slash deals 300% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies within a small AOE. Also applies impair, lowering enemy DEF by 50% for 5s.Lang

Cezanne.name: Cezanne
Cezanne.slotT_effect: Physical DMG increases by 10.0% (15.0% at 5star). Boosts Physical DMG dealt by Ultimate by 18.0% (27.0% at 5star) for a short duration after triggering any of the team's Ultimate. Can trigger once every 10s (cannot stack).
Cezanne.slotM_effect: Increases Bleed Trauma inflicted by wielder by 15.0% (25.0% at 5star). When enemies take Bleed DMG, Bleed DMG is increased by 10.0% (20.0% at 5star) for 10.0s (cannot be stacked but can be reset).
Cezanne.slotB_effect: When hitting character's Combo ATK, all enemies are inflicted with Structure Outline, increasing their Total DMG received by 20.0% (36.0% at 5star) for 6s. CD: 16s. Team's characters are enhanced once. Entering the field again clears the enhancement and causes Structure Outline to last 1.5s longer, up to a maximum of 9s. Structure Outline can only be stacked twice.
Cezanne.setEffect2p: Gain 1 stack when dealing Bleed DMG to enemies. Upon gaining 10 stacks, Physical DMG dealt to enemies increases by 500.0%, clearing all stacks. This DMG counts as Bleed DMG (Gain stacks once every 0.3s, DMG CD: 5.0s. Unable to gain stacks during CD). When equipped by [[Starry Impression]] with B-piece, unleashing Ultimate inflicts Structure Outline on enemies and enhances team. When Structure Outline ends, Total DMG received by enemies increases by 36% for 12s. Structure Outline enters a 20s CD. Can only trigger once in every 20s.
Cezanne.setEffect3p: Wielder gains 35.0% ATK Speed. After using Ultimate, when attacking enemies with broken or no shield, Total DMG dealt is increased by 2.0% for every stack of Bleed inflicted on the enemies (maximum of 10.0%) for 20s. This effect cannot stack and triggering it again resets the duration.Cezanne is a [[stigmata]] in ''Honkai Impact 3rd''.[[Category:Honkai Impact 3 Wiki]]
